subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- AGREE with "Residential Parking Permits for areas near WKU. We can rescue our yards from parking. We pay property taxes for the students' convenience,"
- AGREE with "Plan for people, not cars. Walking should be enjoyable, not a hazard."
- AGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "I still have to drive out of town to eat Golden Corral."
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- DISAGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
- AGREE with "Legalizing marijuana at the state level could produce substantial tax revenue, but if only BG did, it would cause problems."
- AGREE with "Warren county needs to be more proactive about keeping their county maps up to date of new roads or developments especially online. (Google)"
- DISAGREE with "There should never be a leash law in the county - neighborhood dogs protect, play with and teach kids. It was a factor in living in county."
- AGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive internet rates."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "The arts are an important component of K-12 education."
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- DISAGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation
(2) The lack of leadership regarding adequate planning and zoning in BG is discouraging.
(3) Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- AGREE with "I would like to see the WKU psych and Medical programs collaborate on mental health research, which is so sadly lacking in today's society."
- AGREE with "The Barren River water front needs to be improved on both sides of the river and include  canoeing and kayaking water features in the river."
- DISAGREE with "Everyone needs to research (fluoride)...definitely need this to disappear from our water"
- AGREE with "Better incorporation of university resources in community, including Kentucky Museum."
- AGREE with "Public school could do alternate teaching styles(like Montessori) in a school within a school set up.  Not all kids learn the same way."
- DISAGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
- AGREE with "Connect business parking lots to reduce unnecessary traffic on main roadways"
- DISAGREE with "I still have to drive out of town to eat Golden Corral."
- AGREE with "Develop a manufacturing Work training program for jail inmates that qualify"
- AGREE with "Job training programs for lower income"
- AGREE with "New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "KASPER is an invasion of privacy that contradicts what HIPAA regulations try to protect."
- DISAGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- DISAGREE with "Vaping should not be added to the smoking ordinance."
- AGREE with "Spectrum should have competition and not a monopoly. Rates should be regulated by city county government"
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- DISAGREE with "There should never be a leash law in the county - neighborhood dogs protect, play with and teach kids. It was a factor in living in county."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation
(2) The lack of leadership regarding adequate planning and zoning in BG is discouraging.
(3) Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- AGREE with "We need a health food store."
- DISAGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- AGREE with "People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation."
- AGREE with "Spectrum should have competition and not a monopoly. Rates should be regulated by city county government"
- AGREE with "WKU and local community colleges should continue to offer courses that interest those seeking an education, whether or not the courses aid in job placement."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir."
- DISAGREE with "The rental market prices are well beyond an affordable housing level and needs to be addressed given the number of renters in BG."
- AGREE with "If private schools were to get a share of Federal or State education dollars, it would hurt public schools."
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
- DISAGREE with "Build and improve sidewalks in the area of Magnolia Street and 13th to Cabell Drive area for the heavy pedestrian traffic there."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- AGREE with "Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path"
- AGREE with "Busy roads like the by pass either need turn lanes or block left hand turns except at stop lights."
- DISAGREE with "The money I earn & spend is all done within the city limits but as a county resident I have NO voice/vote in city politics. Needs to change!"
- DISAGREE with "Many drivers fail to stop as traffic lights turn red.  As many as 3 cars will travel through an intersection after light has changed to red."
- AGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- DISAGREE with "City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need grocery store competition. Kroger doesn't even try because they don't have to. I'm sick of rotten produce. Let's get a Publix!
(2) Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!
(3) Institute a business development grant that encourages WKU grads to stay in Bowling Green by starting local businesses.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."
- DISAGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
- DISAGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
- AGREE with "We are loosing the city’s long established neighborhoods to multi family developments that do not fit in with the single family residences"
- AGREE with "Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- AGREE with "Local law enforcement would benefit from additional training in community relations."
- AGREE with "The arts are an important component of K-12 education."
- DISAGREE with "A city should have the right to declare itself a sanctuary city."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow"
- DISAGREE with "I still have to drive out of town to eat Golden Corral."
- AGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- DISAGREE with "We already have a lot of parks. And the libraries have become a hangout for the homeless.  Do something about that problem first"
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- AGREE with "City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws"
- DISAGREE with "If city eliminates homelessness via occupational taxes, employers of homeless people need to reimburse city via special occ. tax penalty"
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Local government, for profit and non profits should work together on housing and economic equality
(2) City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws
(3) Minimum wage required for businesses to receive tax credits should be raised to a living wage
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "We need to promote competition in town for Charter. AT&T isn't much better and doesn't serve everywhere. Need more fiber to the homes."
- DISAGREE with "Institutionalize racism is alive and well here. I know because I have experienced it first hand. We need to have a plan."
- DISAGREE with "More sidewalks would be great, but first let’s stop people parking on them.  Or stop spending money building them.  Whichever."
- DISAGREE with "Houston "courtesy police" maintain safety on access rds enforcing right of way & parking/litter rules, assist traffic flow - we need!"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive internet rates."
- DISAGREE with "We need to replace "Room at the Inn" services with temporary decent housing connected to aid agencies for the homeless"
- DISAGREE with "The Bowling Green Daily News is too politically slanted."
- AGREE with "City/county leaders should be cautious of "build it and they will come" mentality for growth and development."
- AGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- AGREE with "More citizens need to be involved in the future development of BG. Too many developers who benefit financially are calling the shots."
- AGREE with "Residents using septic tanks should not be charged for waste water."
- DISAGREE with "The homeless population is getting out of hand. We need to find better methods for curtailing and rehabing and keeping them off the streets."
- AGREE with "Stronger tenant and renters rights. Landlord accountability for keeping properties in good shape. So many overpriced dilapidated rentals."
- AGREE with "Tuckertown area needs fire protection. Currently rated Class 10 expensive insurance. Water lines are close by on Otter Gap & Tuckertown Rds."
- DISAGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- AGREE with "People want it all, without paying for anything. A healthy community requires taxes people."
- AGREE with "Parking  on both sides of the streets  in apartment subdivisions should  should not be allowed  and police need to enforce the law."
- DISAGREE with "We have an estimated 125,000 people but we still don't have a hospital that is trauma center and have to ship everyone to TN or Louisville."
- DISAGREE with "Driving in this town very dangerous, Drivers Education classes should be required for all new drivers!!!"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Individual unhappiness combined with easy legal and illegal availability of drugs drives the opioid crisis.
(2) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.
(3) State and federal medical societies are unable or unwilling to police their members regarding the drug dependency problem.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: The very low number of immigrants coming to our county last year was a good thing. Saves costs: Schools, courts, social services-Our taxes!

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- AGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."
- DISAGREE with "Don't waste $800,000 of tax dollars for a fountain in Lamkin park. Residents would be better served with educational programs for the youth!"

- DISAGREE with "The lack of leadership regarding adequate planning and zoning in BG is discouraging."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- DISAGREE with "Minimum wage required for businesses to receive tax credits should be raised to a living wage"
- AGREE with "It would be great if people in neighborhoods could get to know each other better and neighborhoods were like small communities of neighbors."

- DISAGREE with "Some local politicians abuse their power and get away with more than normal citizens."
- AGREE with "BG needs more Summer weekend festivals/activities"
- AGREE with "people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going."

- DISAGREE with "Future charter schools would be a financial burden to public school funding, unless they are held to accountability by local school boards."
- DISAGREE with "More nonviolent inmates convicted of drug possession should be set free."

(2) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "It should be mandatory for all homes/businesses to have visible marking on mailbox and building for their address."
- DISAGREE with "City/county gov't. (in all of there forms) must reflect the racial/ethnic city/county population demographic to assist in recruitment/growth"
- AGREE with "Individuals should be treated equally. Higher positions or who you work for should not release anyone from responsibility of their actions."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more opportunities for the arts and sciences in the Housing Authority so the students there can rise above!"
- DISAGREE with "Rental assistance programs"
- AGREE with "The rental market prices are well beyond an affordable housing level and needs to be addressed given the number of renters in BG."
- DISAGREE with "Lower taxes by auditing every department for total accountability & make cuts where possible. Stop city government waste."
- AGREE with "It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city."
- AGREE with "You can't get a job in this county at a large place of employment if you have OLD DUI's on your record. This is an un-needed punishment!"
- DISAGREE with "No child should go hungry in Bowling Green / Warren County, and it is up to our officials to make sure it doesn’t happen."
- AGREE with "Better public transit and runs 24 /7 so people without cars can get to work. Also more stops added in residential areas."
- DISAGREE with "We have an estimated 125,000 people but we still don't have a hospital that is trauma center and have to ship everyone to TN or Louisville."
- DISAGREE with "Mesonet provides valuable and protective weather information and funding for it should not be cut."
- AGREE with "Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road."
- AGREE with "I would like to see a sift in city planning and zoning to make BG a more walkable city with better sidewalk planning"
- DISAGREE with "Recycling should be encouraged by not charging for the service"
- AGREE with "Local government, for profit and non profits should work together on housing and economic equality"
- DISAGREE with "Need engaging art installations throughout the city. People will be able to experience art, have fun, and share on social media."
- DISAGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
- AGREE with "New developments should help pay to widen the roads in the areas where they are increasing traffic."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.
(2) Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis.
(3) State and federal medical societies are unable or unwilling to police their members regarding the drug dependency problem.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15.

- DISAGREE with "City School taxes are too high , they need to budget more"

- AGREE with "The rental market prices are well beyond an affordable housing level and needs to be addressed given the number of renters in BG."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem."
- AGREE with "the Bark Park needs more trees and water access for the smaller dogs area"
- AGREE with "Shopping should be spread across all four corners of the county, so the traffic on Scottsville rd and Campbell lane will be improved."
- AGREE with "We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new."
- AGREE with "Some county roads, such as Hammett Hill Road, are so narrow it's hard for two cars to pass. Surely they could make them a little wider."
- DISAGREE with "The very low number of immigrants coming to our county last year was a good thing. Saves costs: Schools, courts, social services-Our taxes!"
- DISAGREE with "There is too much bullying in our schools that administrators are ignoring."
- AGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- DISAGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- DISAGREE with "We need to replace "Room at the Inn" services with temporary decent housing connected to aid agencies for the homeless"
- DISAGREE with "city officials might look into layoff practices on jobs in bowling green ky"
- AGREE with "Lease laws should be enacted and enforced in the county as they are in the city."
- DISAGREE with "High sugar items like pop tarts and chocolate muffins should not be a part of the public school breakfast menu"
- AGREE with "Curbside Recycling and/or Recycle Center in South Warren County"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should consider a program, like Ft Worth Texas's Clean Slate, in which the homeless can earn money by cleaning up the city."
- DISAGREE with "Driving in this town very dangerous, Drivers Education classes should be required for all new drivers!!!"
- AGREE with "The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- DISAGREE with "Urban sprawl in Bowling Green is a major problem that has made this city less walking/bike friendly."
- DISAGREE with "Human trafficking in Bowling Green needs to be investigated by the FBI before it becomes a larger problem swept under the rug."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Individual unhappiness combined with easy legal and illegal availability of drugs drives the opioid crisis.
(2) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.
(3) Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: When resurfacing a roadway, attention should be given to making the manhole covers level with the new surface.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- AGREE with "BGDN should publish each month the number of job positions filled / people employed through the Workforce Development Board’s efforts."
- DISAGREE with "Need engaging art installations throughout the city. People will be able to experience art, have fun, and share on social media."
- DISAGREE with "Arts-based charter schools"
- AGREE with "Increase green spaces, especially near mall, to decrease congestion and improve "green" status"
- AGREE with "I hope BG can one day link the short, scattered bicycle paths."
- AGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- DISAGREE with "A senior living community, designed for 50+ residents rather than 75+ & in failing health residents, is needed — and apparently ignored."
- DISAGREE with "The lack of leadership regarding adequate planning and zoning in BG is discouraging."
- AGREE with "More citizens need to be involved in the future development of BG. Too many developers who benefit financially are calling the shots."
- AGREE with "Make it a walking city. Sidewalks along the main avenues (scottsville rd, campbell ln, 31 bypass) with plants, benches, art pieces."
- DISAGREE with "We need more incentives for individual and business solar power"
- AGREE with "Historic preservation of homes and buildings needs countywide attention to maintain our unique architectural heritage."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "People should not be allowed to bring their pets every place or store they go to."
- AGREE with "Affordable supports for the elderly and aging population are needed in our community."
- DISAGREE with "Driver’s education needs to be more thorough and mandatory before 16 year olds are even allowed to drive home from the courthouse."
- DISAGREE with "Local law enforcement would benefit from additional training in community relations."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Individual unhappiness combined with easy legal and illegal availability of drugs drives the opioid crisis.
(2) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.
(3) Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree

- AGREE with "Our city should make a bid for Google Fiber to help compete with Spectrum and AT&T."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- DISAGREE with "The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work"
- AGREE with "We need to SHADE street lamps. This actually increases visibility, reduces glare, and saves energy/ money. Using LEDs would save money, too."
- DISAGREE with "The money I earn & spend is all done within the city limits but as a county resident I have NO voice/vote in city politics. Needs to change!"
- AGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "BG needs more Summer weekend festivals/activities"
- AGREE with "Cutting a major sports program would be the best way for WKU to deal with budget cuts without harming academics."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green  has been monopolized by Houchens.  Limit their growth they own too much of the city for it to be fair to other businesses"
- DISAGREE with "One should not be able to literally "buy" their way into ability to vote in an election in a locality they do not live in.  $ don't buy vote"
- AGREE with "We need to SHADE street lamps. This actually increases visibility, reduces glare, and saves energy/ money. Using LEDs would save money, too."
- AGREE with "Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path"
- AGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler."
- DISAGREE with "Mesonet provides valuable and protective weather information and funding for it should not be cut."
- AGREE with "We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG."
- DISAGREE with "We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem."
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- AGREE with "A clean, efficient public transportation system would be a huge help to those with limited ability or desire to drive."
- AGREE with "Create pedestrian-only streets."
- DISAGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
- DISAGREE with "Minimum wage needs to go o $15 per hour"
- DISAGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- DISAGREE with "Don't waste $800,000 of tax dollars for a fountain in Lamkin park. Residents would be better served with educational programs for the youth!"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Individual unhappiness combined with easy legal and illegal availability of drugs drives the opioid crisis.
(2) Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis.
(3) State and federal medical societies are unable or unwilling to police their members regarding the drug dependency problem.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- AGREE with "Some county roads, such as Hammett Hill Road, are so narrow it's hard for two cars to pass. Surely they could make them a little wider."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive cable rates."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more opportunities for the arts and sciences in the Housing Authority so the students there can rise above!"
- AGREE with "Louisville rd area needs more businesses and restaurants extending out towards the factories to also bring in revenue from Edmonson Co."
- AGREE with "The rental market prices are well beyond an affordable housing level and needs to be addressed given the number of renters in BG."
- AGREE with "People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation."
- AGREE with "More roundabouts for intersections"
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more aid for the homeless whether: tiny house park, health clinic, rehabilitation, job readiness sources."
- AGREE with "All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs stricter code enforcement on property use and condition in some neighborhoods."
- AGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- DISAGREE with "City had 109 homeless students in 2017, County Had 112.  Housing those families temporarily is worth raising tax rate from 1.85% to 1.91%."
- DISAGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- DISAGREE with "Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security"
- AGREE with "Install new sidewalks along major roads, like Three Springs, and city-wide bike routes, to decrease likelihood of accidents"
- DISAGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
- DISAGREE with "There should be an actual complaint filed by a neighbor before Code Enforcement writes a violation. Stop harassing hardworking citizens."
- DISAGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
- DISAGREE with "All new and existing sidewalks should have shade trees"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Individual unhappiness combined with easy legal and illegal availability of drugs drives the opioid crisis.
(2) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.
(3) Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Like Steamers but hate they ruined that historic building"
- AGREE with "Historic preservation of homes and buildings needs countywide attention to maintain our unique architectural heritage."
- DISAGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- AGREE with "Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility."
- AGREE with "A person should not miss rent (say due to a car breakdown) and face eviction in less than 2 weeks (before next payday). Make it 30 days."
- DISAGREE with "City needs to mandate temp services furnish details of how much they are selling employee labor for, to the employee."
- DISAGREE with "Make Scott Waste follow their contract - Return trash cans next to the house and not leave them on the sidewalks.  Keep BG clean!"
- DISAGREE with "There is no reason not to spend 6 cents per $100 to eliminate homelessness for hundreds of school children."
- AGREE with "Need a better way to work with tenants in the downtown district. Too many come and go because they lack business skills."
- AGREE with "Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling green needs to work in beautifying the city . More Boulvard like roads with planted flowers and reducing overhead utility clusters."
- AGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green City Commission needs to pass an ordinance banning the sale or use of large fireworks in the city limits."
- AGREE with "I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets."
- DISAGREE with "We need more activities for families, such as a large-scale all-in-one kids play arena like All About Kids."
- DISAGREE with "City needs to bar big COs employing from half a dozen temp services to keep 100s ineligble for FMLA due to less than 50 ppl/per 'employer'"
- DISAGREE with "Post-secondary training programs for special education students."
- DISAGREE with "BG Parks needs more funding  from City"
- AGREE with "Bring a discount grocer to the downtown area."
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Individual unhappiness combined with easy legal and illegal availability of drugs drives the opioid crisis.
(2) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.
(3) State and federal medical societies are unable or unwilling to police their members regarding the drug dependency problem.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Need new schools in Warren County to keep up with population growth, CTE is falling down, Drakes and Greenwood high are way overcrowded"
- AGREE with "A fresh food grocery store to be built in Delafield and Morgantown rd areas within walking distance of residents."
- AGREE with "BGDN should publish each month the number of job positions filled / people employed through the Workforce Development Board’s efforts."
- AGREE with "With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery."
- DISAGREE with "Local fuel prices need to investigated."
- DISAGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."
- DISAGREE with "Planning & Zoning need to do a better job of listening & working with residents. It's not next to their house, so they don't care!"
- AGREE with "The rental market prices are well beyond an affordable housing level and needs to be addressed given the number of renters in BG."
- DISAGREE with "We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful."
- DISAGREE with "We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it."
- AGREE with "A clean, efficient public transportation system would be a huge help to those with limited ability or desire to drive."
- DISAGREE with "Future charter schools would be a financial burden to public school funding, unless they are held to accountability by local school boards."
- DISAGREE with "Recycling centers should be moved out of town."
- AGREE with "We need well planned service roads, instead of so many driveways directly on streets like Campbell Lane and the By pass."
- DISAGREE with "The WKU Nursing Program should be expanded so we have more nurses"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- AGREE with "Shopping should be spread across all four corners of the county, so the traffic on Scottsville rd and Campbell lane will be improved."
- AGREE with "Shade trees should be required plantings along all Greenways"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling green needs to work in beautifying the city . More Boulvard like roads with planted flowers and reducing overhead utility clusters."
- DISAGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem.
(2) Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis.
(3) State and federal medical societies are unable or unwilling to police their members regarding the drug dependency problem.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree

prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."

- DISAGREE with "City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws"

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

(3) Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "BG needs to install traffic cameras that help police intersections like Gallatin, TN.  This would reduce accidents, traffic flow and add $"

- DISAGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "No family should be homeless in Bowling Green / Warren County, and it is up to our officials to make sure they have options for shelter."
- DISAGREE with "Most drugs except meth should be free & government controlled. See Belgium."
- DISAGREE with "Sidewalks are needed along Gary Farms Blvd"
- AGREE with "A fresh food grocery store to be built in Delafield and Morgantown rd areas within walking distance of residents."
- AGREE with "Law enforcement should send drug possession arrestees for rehabilitation services rather than imprisonment."
- AGREE with "Developing more bike trails into surrounding areas of the city would allow for a more developed both transport and recreational experiences"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive cable rates."
- DISAGREE with "The Smokey Bones entrance off of Scottsville Road is extremely dangerous and needs a traffic light."
- AGREE with "Plan for people, not cars. Walking should be enjoyable, not a hazard."
- AGREE with "The fact that there is not as much coverage about African American deaths from cocaine as there is about deaths in the white community from opioids, even though there are as many of them, is evidence of institutionalized racism."
- DISAGREE with "BG needs to install traffic cameras that help police intersections like Gallatin, TN.  This would reduce accidents, traffic flow and add $"
- AGREE with "We need a WHOLE FOOD store."
- AGREE with "Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city."
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- AGREE with "BG police should improve officer training and should be held accountable for abuse of power."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should pass the Uniform Residential Landlord and Tenant Act (or URLTA) to ensure basic standards for landlords and tenants."
- DISAGREE with "Residential Parking Permits for areas near WKU. We can rescue our yards from parking. We pay property taxes for the students' convenience,"
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.
(2) Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city.
(3) It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "We already have a lot of parks. And the libraries have become a hangout for the homeless.  Do something about that problem first"
- DISAGREE with "Build parking areas."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- DISAGREE with "The entire bypass area is an eyesore and there needs to be a concerted effort like a TIF to revitalize this crucial part of town."
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- DISAGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- AGREE with "More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs"
- AGREE with "Affordable supports for the elderly and aging population are needed in our community."
- AGREE with "Cutting a major sports program would be the best way for WKU to deal with budget cuts without harming academics."
- AGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- AGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- DISAGREE with "I feel Bowling Green could benefit with an additional ambulance service.  Quicker response, and possibly a lower payment when used."
- AGREE with "Too many trees have been torn down to make way for new developments. We should re-plant more trees around Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "The road closure between Shawnee and Patton Way makes access to Nashville Rd take 3 times as long and is a major annoyance."
- DISAGREE with "City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws"
- DISAGREE with "Busy roads like the by pass either need turn lanes or block left hand turns except at stop lights."
- AGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "I would love to see a Texas Roadhouse in Bowling Green"
- AGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.
(2) We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG.
(3) It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."
- DISAGREE with "There are no public adult swim facilities in Bowling Green for year around physical use. The Lovers Lane Complex should be made available"
- DISAGREE with "Residential Parking Permits for areas near WKU. We can rescue our yards from parking. We pay property taxes for the students' convenience,"
- DISAGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Impact on traffic flow should be considered with any proposed new developments."
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- AGREE with "People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation."
- AGREE with "Require new downtown developments to become LEED certified"
- AGREE with "No child should go hungry in Bowling Green / Warren County, and it is up to our officials to make sure it doesn’t happen."
- AGREE with "Allow residence of an area to vote on new developments that might have impact on them opposed to commissioners/magistrates getting kickbacks"
- AGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- AGREE with "City had 109 homeless students in 2017, County Had 112.  Housing those families temporarily is worth raising tax rate from 1.85% to 1.91%."
- AGREE with "The fact that there is not as much coverage about African American deaths from cocaine as there is about deaths in the white community from opioids, even though there are as many of them, is evidence of institutionalized racism."
- DISAGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green is in need of an ice rink for recreation and sport."
- AGREE with "Improved businesses such as banks and groceries in lowest income areas"
- DISAGREE with "There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs."
- AGREE with "We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.
(2) We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG.
(3) Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
- AGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "New developments should help pay to widen the roads in the areas where they are increasing traffic."
- DISAGREE with "BG needs to install traffic cameras that help police intersections like Gallatin, TN.  This would reduce accidents, traffic flow and add $"
- AGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
- AGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
- AGREE with "Recycling services need to be expanded & improved. With growing population, think of how much land will become dump sites...Ridiculous!"
- AGREE with "Individuals should be treated equally. Higher positions or who you work for should not release anyone from responsibility of their actions."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs ev car charging stations. There are none available unless you own a Tesla."
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."
- AGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- AGREE with "A fresh food grocery store to be built in Delafield and Morgantown rd areas within walking distance of residents."
- AGREE with "The arts are an important component of K-12 education."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- DISAGREE with "Five lane Cemetery Road from Interchange to By Pass, except four lanes through the Cemetery with median prohibiting left turns."
- DISAGREE with "Busy roads like the by pass either need turn lanes or block left hand turns except at stop lights."
- AGREE with "Develop the Greenway so that the paved trail is continuous and reaches major parts of the city including the square, WKU, GM, and others."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.
(2) We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG.
(3) It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "A senior living community, designed for 50+ residents rather than 75+ & in failing health residents, is needed — and apparently ignored."
- DISAGREE with "Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green has many excellent non-public schools; more should be done to make these options available to diverse and low-income families."
- AGREE with "Our sidewalks need more connectivity. It's too piecemealed and makes some areas unusable."
- DISAGREE with "Downtown redevelopment should retain accessible parking for existing businesses."
- DISAGREE with "BG needs an indoor tennis option"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- AGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- AGREE with "If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget."
- DISAGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- DISAGREE with "With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery."
- AGREE with "More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs"
- AGREE with "A fresh food grocery store to be built in Delafield and Morgantown rd areas within walking distance of residents."
- DISAGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should try to emulate Owensboro's Friday night programs downtown."
- DISAGREE with "Residential Parking Permits for areas near WKU. We can rescue our yards from parking. We pay property taxes for the students' convenience,"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- AGREE with "People want it all, without paying for anything. A healthy community requires taxes people."
- DISAGREE with "The road closure between Shawnee and Patton Way makes access to Nashville Rd take 3 times as long and is a major annoyance."
- DISAGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.
(2) Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city.
(3) It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students.

- AGREE with "big projeck in city sould be vote by people"
- AGREE with "The arts enrich our city."
- AGREE with "A fresh food grocery store to be built in Delafield and Morgantown rd areas within walking distance of residents."
- DISAGREE with "The feeder road at Shive Lane and Scottsville Road need to be closed off. It is very dangerous."
- DISAGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."
- DISAGREE with "New developments should help pay to widen the roads in the areas where they are increasing traffic."
- AGREE with "Make all future sidewalks wide enough for multi-use (walking, biking, skateboarding etc)"
- AGREE with "With drug use being so prevalent in Warren county, better treatment options need to be offered."

- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs ev car charging stations. There are none available unless you own a Tesla."
- DISAGREE with "More sidewalks would be great, but first let’s stop people parking on them.  Or stop spending money building them.  Whichever."
- AGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive internet rates."
- AGREE with "Oversight committees for projects such as TIF. Elected officials should not be able to sit on unelected boards."
- DISAGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- AGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.

".Would the person agree with this: "Invest in the youth."? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
test_comment: Invest in the youth.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "7% of Paker-Bennett &  3.7% of Bristow homeless. I will pay 6 cents per $100 income to end homelessness for school-age families via Apt. $"
- AGREE with "I regularly discuss politics with people I disagree with."
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
- AGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- AGREE with "Too many trees have been torn down to make way for new developments. We should re-plant more trees around Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery."
- DISAGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- DISAGREE with "We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it."
- AGREE with "City should pay 1.2-1.5m per annum for all homeless k-12 student/families a studio apartment at $500 or less. fund by occ tax move to 1.91%"
- AGREE with "Make all future sidewalks wide enough for multi-use (walking, biking, skateboarding etc)"
- AGREE with "Consider asking low-income or disabled residents what they really need."
- DISAGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- AGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- DISAGREE with "We already have a lot of parks. And the libraries have become a hangout for the homeless.  Do something about that problem first"
- DISAGREE with "The intersection of Scottsville road and entrance to Greenview Hospital needs to be widened"
- DISAGREE with "I feel Bowling Green could benefit with an additional ambulance service.  Quicker response, and possibly a lower payment when used."
- AGREE with "Create pedestrian-only streets."
- DISAGREE with "Regulate the size & brightness of business signs."
- DISAGREE with "The road closure between Shawnee and Patton Way makes access to Nashville Rd take 3 times as long and is a major annoyance."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG.
(2) Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city.
(3) It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Five lane Cemetery Road from Interchange to By Pass, except four lanes through the Cemetery with median prohibiting left turns.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "SKYPAC needs to bring in younger, more entertaining acts. It will fall apart if they keep only catering to 50+. Could be a great venue."
- AGREE with "BG police should improve officer training and should be held accountable for abuse of power."
- AGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."
- AGREE with "More nonviolent inmates convicted of drug possession should be set free."
- DISAGREE with "Recycling centers should be moved out of town."
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- DISAGREE with "I feel Bowling Green could benefit with an additional ambulance service.  Quicker response, and possibly a lower payment when used."
- AGREE with "Affordable supports for the elderly and aging population are needed in our community."
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."
- DISAGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."
- AGREE with "I would like to see a sift in city planning and zoning to make BG a more walkable city with better sidewalk planning"
- AGREE with "Reducing poverty will enhance the quality of life for everyone in our community regardless of status."
- DISAGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- AGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
- AGREE with "Human trafficking in Bowling Green needs to be investigated by the FBI before it becomes a larger problem swept under the rug."
- DISAGREE with "Impact on traffic flow should be considered with any proposed new developments."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG.
(2) Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city.
(3) It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: All students in Warren county should have the best available education, not the Kentucky minimum, at all times.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- AGREE with "Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility."
- AGREE with "District judges are biased towards large local companies to the detriment of individuals."
- DISAGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green is in need of an ice rink for recreation and sport."
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- DISAGREE with "Five lane Cemetery Road from Interchange to By Pass, except four lanes through the Cemetery with median prohibiting left turns."
- DISAGREE with "Some county roads, such as Hammett Hill Road, are so narrow it's hard for two cars to pass. Surely they could make them a little wider."
- DISAGREE with "BGMU needs to offer residential fiber internet as a UTILITY, using Chattanooga as a perfect example."
- DISAGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- AGREE with "All students in Warren county should have the best available education, not the Kentucky minimum, at all times."
- AGREE with "More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs"
- AGREE with "More nonviolent inmates convicted of drug possession should be set free."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- DISAGREE with "If city eliminates homelessness via occupational taxes, employers of homeless people need to reimburse city via special occ. tax penalty"
- AGREE with "Recycling services need to be expanded & improved. With growing population, think of how much land will become dump sites...Ridiculous!"
- DISAGREE with "I feel Bowling Green could benefit with an additional ambulance service.  Quicker response, and possibly a lower payment when used."
- DISAGREE with "BG needs to install traffic cameras that help police intersections like Gallatin, TN.  This would reduce accidents, traffic flow and add $"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.
(2) We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG.
(3) It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected.

- AGREE with "I should be allowed to plant flowers in my own yard where ever i want them."
- AGREE with "Shade trees should be required plantings along all Greenways"
- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "The Bowling Green/Warren County Airport needs to be relocated outside of the city limits."
- DISAGREE with "Emergency protective orders should not be able to be obtained regarding claims of an incident from a year ago."
- AGREE with "Companies that claim they cannot fill job openings should raise wages and improve working conditions."
- DISAGREE with "City residents do not receive adequate return on County Taxes paid."
- AGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- DISAGREE with "Cutting a major sports program would be the best way for WKU to deal with budget cuts without harming academics."
- DISAGREE with "Public school could do alternate teaching styles(like Montessori) in a school within a school set up.  Not all kids learn the same way."
- DISAGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- AGREE with "city needs to work on water run off when we have a lot of rain.. to many places flood on roadways makes driving very dangerous.."
- AGREE with "Some local politicians abuse their power and get away with more than normal citizens."
- DISAGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
- DISAGREE with "The Smokey Bones entrance off of Scottsville Road is extremely dangerous and needs a traffic light."
- AGREE with "Develop the Greenway so that the paved trail is continuous and reaches major parts of the city including the square, WKU, GM, and others."
- AGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- DISAGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- AGREE with "BG police should improve officer training and should be held accountable for abuse of power."
- DISAGREE with "You shouldn't be required to pay County taxes if you live in the City (but not the other way around). It makes no sense."
- AGREE with "Local food and small farms are one of BG best attractions."
- DISAGREE with "Parking in apartment subdivisions  should monitored closely by police. Parking on subdivision streets shouldn't be allowed."
- AGREE with "Local fuel prices need to investigated."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) WKU should consider building a parking structure at the Chestnut St lot.
(2) Refugees should be required to learn and speak english.
(3) Bowling Green is in need of an ice rink for recreation and sport.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Make all future sidewalks wide enough for multi-use (walking, biking, skateboarding etc)"
- DISAGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- DISAGREE with "Stronger tenant and renters rights. Landlord accountability for keeping properties in good shape. So many overpriced dilapidated rentals."
- AGREE with "City/County officials with connections to a project or proposal should abstain from voting on the project or proposal."
- AGREE with "Take advantage of the wonderful summers in KY and have more outdoor public swimming spaces"
- DISAGREE with "Residents using septic tanks should not be charged for waste water."
- DISAGREE with "Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road."
- AGREE with "We need to promote competition in town for Charter. AT&T isn't much better and doesn't serve everywhere. Need more fiber to the homes."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- AGREE with "People want it all, without paying for anything. A healthy community requires taxes people."
- AGREE with "Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards."
- DISAGREE with "Planning & Zoning need to do a better job of listening & working with residents. It's not next to their house, so they don't care!"
- DISAGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- AGREE with "Crime is worse in Bowling Green / Warren County than it was a decade ago."
- AGREE with "Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation"
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- DISAGREE with "We need urban planning to ensure that mixed use housing, shopping and new neighborhoods are created to make our community better"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs Community Enrichment Classes that include woodworking, welding, gardening and general home beautification for hobbyist."
- AGREE with "A clean, efficient public transportation system would be a huge help to those with limited ability or desire to drive."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it.
(2) Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe.
(3) Why isn't Nashville Rd between the roundabout and Campbell Ln wider? Getting stuck there at 5 o'clock is a plague.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro.
