subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "WKU should upgrade their CIT program to keep up with the times"
- AGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir."
- AGREE with "Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards."
- DISAGREE with "I still have to drive out of town to eat Golden Corral."
- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
- AGREE with "City/County officials with connections to a project or proposal should abstain from voting on the project or proposal."
- DISAGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- AGREE with "We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful."
- DISAGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- AGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
- AGREE with "Driver’s education needs to be more thorough and mandatory before 16 year olds are even allowed to drive home from the courthouse."
- AGREE with "Officials that use social media accounts in a professional capacity should not be allowed to block constituents except under rare conditions like being threatened."
- DISAGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see the WKU psych and Medical programs collaborate on mental health research, which is so sadly lacking in today's society."
- DISAGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
- AGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together.
(2) Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources
(3) The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "There isn’t enough here to draw young families. We need a beautification of the riverfront and a more walkable city for young professionals"
- AGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more aid for the homeless whether: tiny house park, health clinic, rehabilitation, job readiness sources."
- AGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- AGREE with "The money I earn & spend is all done within the city limits but as a county resident I have NO voice/vote in city politics. Needs to change!"
- DISAGREE with "City should bar non-competes, similar to North Dakota/California, as driving destitution in non-tenure work force. Be heroic destination."
- AGREE with "There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together."
- AGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "One should not be able to literally "buy" their way into ability to vote in an election in a locality they do not live in.  $ don't buy vote"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- DISAGREE with "The fact that there is not as much coverage about African American deaths from cocaine as there is about deaths in the white community from opioids, even though there are as many of them, is evidence of institutionalized racism."
- DISAGREE with "Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills."
- DISAGREE with "The city and county school systems should merge."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- AGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."
- DISAGREE with "The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships."
- DISAGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive cable rates."
- AGREE with "Driver’s education needs to be more thorough and mandatory before 16 year olds are even allowed to drive home from the courthouse."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) There should be greater checks on our County and City executives. They don't wield too much power but they do wield far too much influence.
(2) Like Steamers but hate they ruined that historic building
(3) Wish the airport would get better flights. WheelsUp was cool but need more locations. Sad Owensboro is so far ahead there.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival.

prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- AGREE with "Make it a walking city. Sidewalks along the main avenues (scottsville rd, campbell ln, 31 bypass) with plants, benches, art pieces."
- DISAGREE with "We need urban planning to ensure that mixed use housing, shopping and new neighborhoods are created to make our community better"
- AGREE with "Graves Gilbert has created a healthcare monopoly within Bowling Green and the surrounding areas."
- AGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see the WKU psych and Medical programs collaborate on mental health research, which is so sadly lacking in today's society."
- DISAGREE with "Many drivers fail to stop as traffic lights turn red.  As many as 3 cars will travel through an intersection after light has changed to red."
- DISAGREE with "The downtown district, especially Fountain Square, should have more retail businesses, not offices."
- DISAGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"
- DISAGREE with "More nonviolent inmates convicted of drug possession should be set free."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green City Commission needs to pass an ordinance banning the sale or use of large fireworks in the city limits."
- AGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- AGREE with "Warren county needs to be "wet". The city is wet but the county is dry."
- AGREE with "More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs"
- AGREE with "With drug use being so prevalent in Warren county, better treatment options need to be offered."
- AGREE with "Warren County should be completely wet, the idea of a “moist” County is outdated and stunting the financial growth and tourism opportunity."
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- AGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together.
(2) We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem.
(3) Why isn't Nashville Rd between the roundabout and Campbell Ln wider? Getting stuck there at 5 o'clock is a plague.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "City and county parks departments should provide more programming for adults and seniors."
- AGREE with "There should be greater checks on our County and City executives. They don't wield too much power but they do wield far too much influence."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green should pass the Uniform Residential Landlord and Tenant Act (or URLTA) to ensure basic standards for landlords and tenants."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more aid for the homeless whether: tiny house park, health clinic, rehabilitation, job readiness sources."
- DISAGREE with "The fact that there is not as much coverage about African American deaths from cocaine as there is about deaths in the white community from opioids, even though there are as many of them, is evidence of institutionalized racism."
- DISAGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
- AGREE with "Some local politicians abuse their power and get away with more than normal citizens."
- DISAGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- AGREE with "More concerts should be held in Bowling Green"
- DISAGREE with "Many drivers fail to stop as traffic lights turn red.  As many as 3 cars will travel through an intersection after light has changed to red."
- AGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "Make all future sidewalks wide enough for multi-use (walking, biking, skateboarding etc)"
- AGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- DISAGREE with "Impact on traffic flow should be considered with any proposed new developments."
- AGREE with "Encourage connection between the wealthy and the poor"
- DISAGREE with "Residents using septic tanks should not be charged for waste water."
- AGREE with "City should bar garbage token health plans designed to prevent temp services paying $166/month Obamacare emp. fee. Let ppl get subsidy."
- AGREE with "Unelected school board officials should not have the power to create, add, or increase "school taxes"."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it.
(2) I think we have enough restaurants.
(3) You shouldn't be required to pay County taxes if you live in the City (but not the other way around). It makes no sense.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "City should bar garbage token health plans designed to prevent temp services paying $166/month Obamacare emp. fee. Let ppl get subsidy."
- DISAGREE with "The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships."
- DISAGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."
- DISAGREE with "If city eliminates homelessness via occupational taxes, employers of homeless people need to reimburse city via special occ. tax penalty"
- DISAGREE with "If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- AGREE with "The homeless population is getting out of hand. We need to find better methods for curtailing and rehabing and keeping them off the streets."
- AGREE with "More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs"
- DISAGREE with "My employer has not been responsive to reports of sexual harassment in the workplace."
- AGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- DISAGREE with "Stronger tenant and renters rights. Landlord accountability for keeping properties in good shape. So many overpriced dilapidated rentals."
- AGREE with "Develop a manufacturing Work training program for jail inmates that qualify"
- DISAGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- AGREE with "It would be great if people in neighborhoods could get to know each other better and neighborhoods were like small communities of neighbors."
- AGREE with "SKYPAC needs to bring in younger, more entertaining acts. It will fall apart if they keep only catering to 50+. Could be a great venue."
- DISAGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- AGREE with "We need look for a Natcher connection on Three Springs or Elrod Rd"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem.
(2) The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them.
(3) We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Bring a discount grocer to the downtown area."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
- DISAGREE with "Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow"
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- DISAGREE with "The population has out grown the infrastructure in bg/ warren county."
- DISAGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- AGREE with "Make it a walking city. Sidewalks along the main avenues (scottsville rd, campbell ln, 31 bypass) with plants, benches, art pieces."
- AGREE with "The airport should be moved to the transpark."
- AGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
- AGREE with "New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place."
- AGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
- AGREE with "BG needs more Summer weekend festivals/activities"
- DISAGREE with "City should bar non-competes, similar to North Dakota/California, as driving destitution in non-tenure work force. Be heroic destination."
- AGREE with "Every railroad crossing needs an elevating arm. Too many near accidents for something so inexpensive."
- DISAGREE with "Planning & Zoning need to do a better job of listening & working with residents. It's not next to their house, so they don't care!"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
- DISAGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem.
(2) There should be greater checks on our County and City executives. They don't wield too much power but they do wield far too much influence.
(3) Our sidewalks need more connectivity. It's too piecemealed and makes some areas unusable.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Busy roads like the by pass either need turn lanes or block left hand turns except at stop lights."
- DISAGREE with "The population has out grown the infrastructure in bg/ warren county."
- DISAGREE with "Stronger tenant and renters rights. Landlord accountability for keeping properties in good shape. So many overpriced dilapidated rentals."
- AGREE with "SKYPAC needs to bring in younger, more entertaining acts. It will fall apart if they keep only catering to 50+. Could be a great venue."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green City Commission needs to pass an ordinance banning the sale or use of large fireworks in the city limits."
- DISAGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow"
- AGREE with "Crime is worse in Bowling Green / Warren County than it was a decade ago."
- AGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- DISAGREE with "Impact on traffic flow should be considered with any proposed new developments."
- AGREE with "Unelected school board officials should not have the power to create, add, or increase "school taxes"."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs stricter code enforcement on property use and condition in some neighborhoods."
- AGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- AGREE with "Individuals should be treated equally. Higher positions or who you work for should not release anyone from responsibility of their actions."
- AGREE with "A person should not miss rent (say due to a car breakdown) and face eviction in less than 2 weeks (before next payday). Make it 30 days."
- DISAGREE with "Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills."
- DISAGREE with "WKU should upgrade their CIT program to keep up with the times"
- AGREE with "People need to do all their research before accusing local officials of using their influence for personal gain."
- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together.
(2) Our sidewalks need more connectivity. It's too piecemealed and makes some areas unusable.
(3) The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "I still have to drive out of town to eat Golden Corral."
- AGREE with "Officials that use social media accounts in a professional capacity should not be allowed to block constituents except under rare conditions like being threatened."
- AGREE with "People want it all, without paying for anything. A healthy community requires taxes people."
- AGREE with "Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty"
- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- DISAGREE with "My employer has not been responsive to reports of sexual harassment in the workplace."
- DISAGREE with "We need to make it worthwhile for builders to create more quality affordable rental units for residents, rather than more luxury units."
- AGREE with "The arts enrich our city."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
- AGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- DISAGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green should pass the Uniform Residential Landlord and Tenant Act (or URLTA) to ensure basic standards for landlords and tenants."
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- AGREE with "People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation."
- DISAGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- DISAGREE with "The fact that there is not as much coverage about African American deaths from cocaine as there is about deaths in the white community from opioids, even though there are as many of them, is evidence of institutionalized racism."
- AGREE with "City and county parks departments should provide more programming for adults and seniors."
- AGREE with "Encourage connection between the wealthy and the poor"
- AGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass
(2) The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them.
(3) We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "Bring a discount grocer to the downtown area."

- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs stricter code enforcement on property use and condition in some neighborhoods."

- DISAGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."
- DISAGREE with "Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills."
- DISAGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- AGREE with "We are loosing the city’s long established neighborhoods to multi family developments that do not fit in with the single family residences"
- DISAGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
- AGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- AGREE with "Build and improve sidewalks in the area of Magnolia Street and 13th to Cabell Drive area for the heavy pedestrian traffic there."
- AGREE with "Install new sidewalks along major roads, like Three Springs, and city-wide bike routes, to decrease likelihood of accidents"
- DISAGREE with "More nonviolent inmates convicted of drug possession should be set free."
- AGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- AGREE with "Every railroad crossing needs an elevating arm. Too many near accidents for something so inexpensive."
- DISAGREE with "WKU should upgrade their CIT program to keep up with the times"
- AGREE with "I think we have enough restaurants."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together.
(2) Big names and corporations get away with too much. We need fairer regulation and level playing fields for the small and big guys alike.
(3) We need more businesses like White Squirrel and Nats in BG. They add character to our town. Done with the Olive Garden and Belks.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

- DISAGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"

- AGREE with "Our sidewalks need more connectivity. It's too piecemealed and makes some areas unusable."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs stricter code enforcement on property use and condition in some neighborhoods."
- AGREE with "We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements."

- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
- AGREE with "Local government, for profit and non profits should work together on housing and economic equality"
- AGREE with "We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- DISAGREE with "The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships."
- DISAGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

- DISAGREE with "My employer has not been responsive to reports of sexual harassment in the workplace."
- DISAGREE with "11,000 Total American deaths from cocaine is not equal to 45,000 deaths from opoids, therefore false race-baiting news is a problem."
- AGREE with "Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation"

- DISAGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- DISAGREE with "One should not be able to literally "buy" their way into ability to vote in an election in a locality they do not live in.  $ don't buy vote"

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Unelected school board officials should not have the power to create, add, or increase "school taxes"."

- AGREE with "Our city should make a bid for Google Fiber to help compete with Spectrum and AT&T."

- AGREE with "I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req"
- AGREE with "Reduce and/or get rid of the city wage tax."
- DISAGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
- AGREE with "All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students."
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- DISAGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."

- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- DISAGREE with "Warren County should be completely wet, the idea of a “moist” County is outdated and stunting the financial growth and tourism opportunity."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
- AGREE with "There isn’t enough here to draw young families. We need a beautification of the riverfront and a more walkable city for young professionals"
- DISAGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- AGREE with "Our sidewalks need more connectivity. It's too piecemealed and makes some areas unusable."
- AGREE with "Curbside Recycling and/or Recycle Center in South Warren County"
- AGREE with "City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws"
- AGREE with "I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req"
- DISAGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- DISAGREE with "Warren County should be completely wet, the idea of a “moist” County is outdated and stunting the financial growth and tourism opportunity."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- AGREE with "We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."
- DISAGREE with "City had 109 homeless students in 2017, County Had 112.  Housing those families temporarily is worth raising tax rate from 1.85% to 1.91%."
- DISAGREE with "A city should have the right to declare itself a sanctuary city."
- AGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Don't waste $800,000 of tax dollars for a fountain in Lamkin park. Residents would be better served with educational programs for the youth!
(2) Build more roads!!! Traffic is terrible here for a small city.
(3) Reduce and/or get rid of the city wage tax.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws"
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- DISAGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- AGREE with "Institute a business development grant that encourages WKU grads to stay in Bowling Green by starting local businesses."
- AGREE with "Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- DISAGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."
- AGREE with "The city of Bowling Green should enforce their existing noise ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- AGREE with "We need look for a Natcher connection on Three Springs or Elrod Rd"
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- AGREE with "We need to make it worthwhile for builders to create more quality affordable rental units for residents, rather than more luxury units."
- AGREE with "We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new."
- DISAGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- DISAGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- AGREE with "We need more activities for families, such as a large-scale all-in-one kids play arena like All About Kids."
- AGREE with "Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Don't waste $800,000 of tax dollars for a fountain in Lamkin park. Residents would be better served with educational programs for the youth!
(2) Build more roads!!! Traffic is terrible here for a small city.
(3) Reduce and/or get rid of the city wage tax.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Warren County should be completely wet, the idea of a “moist” County is outdated and stunting the financial growth and tourism opportunity.

- AGREE with "County volunteer fire departments need to be upgraded to fit the current population of Warren County."
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- AGREE with "Job training programs for lower income"
- DISAGREE with "Warren County should be completely wet, the idea of a “moist” County is outdated and stunting the financial growth and tourism opportunity."
- AGREE with "There isn’t enough here to draw young families. We need a beautification of the riverfront and a more walkable city for young professionals"
- DISAGREE with "More nonviolent inmates convicted of drug possession should be set free."
- AGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "Minimum wage required for businesses to receive tax credits should be raised to a living wage"

- AGREE with "All public schools should have an adequate summer feeding program so no child goes hungry."

- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."

- DISAGREE with "Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources"

- DISAGREE with "BGMU needs to offer residential fiber internet as a UTILITY, using Chattanooga as a perfect example."
- DISAGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- AGREE with "Post-secondary training programs for special education students."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Drivers tests in BG should test over the rules of a turnabout.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree

- DISAGREE with "How is it that surrounding counties have county wide high speed internet, yet one third of Warren County residents have slow or no internet?"
- DISAGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."

- AGREE with "Parking on the WKU campus should be more accessible to students and visitors."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Consistent, once a month testing of our emergency sirens, not just before potential bad weather."
- AGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "How is it that surrounding counties have county wide high speed internet, yet one third of Warren County residents have slow or no internet?"

- DISAGREE with "More green spaces. All of our parks have just become sports complexes!"

- DISAGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- AGREE with "We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful."
- AGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."
- DISAGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs Community Enrichment Classes that include woodworking, welding, gardening and general home beautification for hobbyist."
- DISAGREE with "Improved businesses such as banks and groceries in lowest income areas"
- AGREE with "More local produce should be incorporated into public school's lunchrooms"
- AGREE with "WKU and local community colleges should continue to offer courses that interest those seeking an education, whether or not the courses aid in job placement."
- DISAGREE with "American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem."
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- AGREE with "We need to make it worthwhile for builders to create more quality affordable rental units for residents, rather than more luxury units."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- DISAGREE with "Companies that claim they cannot fill job openings should raise wages and improve working conditions."
- DISAGREE with "A person should not miss rent (say due to a car breakdown) and face eviction in less than 2 weeks (before next payday). Make it 30 days."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Drivers tests in BG should test over the rules of a turnabout.
(2) Parking on the WKU campus should be more accessible to students and visitors.
(3) Drug information classes should be given to incoming freshmen of WKU to educate them about the risks and health hazards.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "All public schools should have an adequate summer feeding program so no child goes hungry."

- AGREE with "Pass an ordinance that requires pet owners to pay a fee if their pets are not fixed."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green would be better if it didn't have the "Good Ole Boy" system among so many."
- AGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them."
- DISAGREE with "More green spaces. All of our parks have just become sports complexes!"
- DISAGREE with "Legalized Marijuana will not only assist Bowling Green in earning Tax revenue but will decrease the strain on our prison system. Win-Win."

- AGREE with "City/county leaders should be cautious of "build it and they will come" mentality for growth and development."

- AGREE with "Water safety and swim lessons to all k-12 students."

- AGREE with "We need more regulation of opioid drugs, both prescribed and illicit."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- AGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- DISAGREE with "BG police should improve officer training and should be held accountable for abuse of power."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.

- DISAGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- DISAGREE with "After school activity centers for youth with later hours of operation."
- AGREE with "Sewer should be required to be run to all new subdivisions and cost should be split between city/county water systems and builders"
- AGREE with "There should be officers more readily available to the county areas; ex. for domestic violence disputes."
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion is a major problem, so studying traffic flow closely is the first step."
- AGREE with "There should be a push to improve mental health awareness and availability in Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "Businesses and multi-family dwellings should be required to offer and use recycling services."
- DISAGREE with "Bike lanes that are wide enough to safely ride on without fear of being hit by passing cars."
- AGREE with "WKU and local community colleges should continue to offer courses that interest those seeking an education, whether or not the courses aid in job placement."
- DISAGREE with "Improved businesses such as banks and groceries in lowest income areas"
- AGREE with "Need term limits for all local elected officiałs"
- DISAGREE with "Schools should provide an opportunity for nonswimming parent/guardians to have water safety and swimming lessons in private setting."
- DISAGREE with "All new and existing single family housing should have at least one shade tree planting"
- DISAGREE with "More nonviolent inmates convicted of drug possession should be set free."
- DISAGREE with "We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now."
- AGREE with "More parking downtown.  There are too many reserved spaces which should be available in the evening."
- AGREE with "Street lights should be required on residential streets in town. Too many dark corners."
- AGREE with "It would be great if people in neighborhoods could get to know each other better and neighborhoods were like small communities of neighbors."
- AGREE with "Greenwood Mall parking lot could become a cooperative solar collection for itself and home surrounding"
- DISAGREE with "More affordable home ownership options."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Traffic improvement on the so-called Bypass.  Most cities actually have a bypass.  Bowling Green doesn't have one.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Farmers shouldn’t need a permit to build a fence."
- AGREE with "It is easy to find a good job in Warren County."
- DISAGREE with "Apartments for 55 and older that are upscale and lovely."
- AGREE with "Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards."
- DISAGREE with "We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements."
- AGREE with "No child should go hungry in Bowling Green / Warren County, and it is up to our officials to make sure it doesn’t happen."
- AGREE with "People need to do all their research before accusing local officials of using their influence for personal gain."
- AGREE with "New buildings should not be built right up to the sidewalk to inhibit seeing around corners when driving."
- DISAGREE with "Graves Gilbert has created a healthcare monopoly within Bowling Green and the surrounding areas."
- DISAGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
- AGREE with "The city of Bowling Green should enforce their existing noise ordinance."
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- AGREE with "The city and county school systems should merge."
- DISAGREE with "Recycling services need to be improved and modernized. Current contractor uses outdated equipment, services are messy, company unresponsive."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs Community Enrichment Classes that include woodworking, welding, gardening and general home beautification for hobbyist."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green has many excellent non-public schools; more should be done to make these options available to diverse and low-income families."
- DISAGREE with "Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security"
- DISAGREE with "More creative learning classes"
- DISAGREE with "Smoking should not be allowed in public parks."
- AGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green is in need of an ice rink for recreation and sport."
- AGREE with "More local produce should be incorporated into public school's lunchrooms"
- DISAGREE with "Provide accessible transportation for seniors that have difficulty driving"
- AGREE with "The downtown parking garage has been an eyesore for years. It's embarrassing, so fix it!"
- DISAGREE with "A senior living community, designed for 50+ residents rather than 75+ & in failing health residents, is needed — and apparently ignored."
- DISAGREE with "Better parking around the square would draw in more college students who like to shop but can not find parking downtown."
- DISAGREE with "The Bowling Green Daily News is too politically slanted."
- AGREE with "If people are suggesting more advertising for tourists, there needs to be things for tourists to do."
- AGREE with "We have an estimated 125,000 people but we still don't have a hospital that is trauma center and have to ship everyone to TN or Louisville."
- DISAGREE with "Fewer students per teacher should be a rule. No more than 20; ideal class size of 15. Plenty of teachers are looking for work."
- AGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- DISAGREE with "An unmanned trolley system, possibly solar, might be better long term than buses for some areas."
- AGREE with "Greenwood Mall parking lot could become a cooperative solar collection for itself and home surrounding"
- DISAGREE with "Resources to better integrate immigrants and refugees into the community should be put into place."
- AGREE with "WKU should consider building a parking structure at the Chestnut St lot."
- AGREE with "Companies that claim they cannot fill job openings should raise wages and improve working conditions."
- AGREE with "Why has the Police stop enforcing parking regulations? Park any way any direction. Is it time for a separate Traffic Enforcement Division?"
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- DISAGREE with "BG Parks needs more funding  from City"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should have basic zoning mandates in order to beautify decrepit buildings/gravel lawns/general trashiness."
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
- DISAGREE with "Residential Parking Permits for areas near WKU. We can rescue our yards from parking. We pay property taxes for the students' convenience,"
- AGREE with "Consider asking low-income or disabled residents what they really need."
- DISAGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- AGREE with "Our sidewalks need more connectivity. It's too piecemealed and makes some areas unusable."
- AGREE with "The traffic intersection at Scottsville Rd and Pascoe Blvd needs some immediate attention as far as congestion.  It's very unsafe."
- DISAGREE with "Better/more mass media choices available."
- DISAGREE with "Public school systems need to provide more funding for art education programs, such as music, theater, and visual arts."
- AGREE with "Greek Life should be monitored on WKU's campus."
- DISAGREE with "Overdevelopment of rental property is detrimental to cities.  Renters do not pay property tax.  Schools suffer when the tax base is eroded."
- AGREE with "Need term limits for all local elected officiałs"
- AGREE with "Developing more bike trails into surrounding areas of the city would allow for a more developed both transport and recreational experiences"
- DISAGREE with "Bike lanes that are wide enough to safely ride on without fear of being hit by passing cars."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- AGREE with "Create shoulders on the bypass."
- DISAGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
- DISAGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- AGREE with "Smallhouse Rd (at Campbell Ln) heading into town needs to be widened to have room for three lanes (left turn, straight, right turn)."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Legalizing marijuana at the state level could produce substantial tax revenue, but if only BG did, it would cause problems.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Plan for people, not cars. Walking should be enjoyable, not a hazard."
- AGREE with "We must ensure historic preservation codes are properly enforced in our historic districts; lack of consistency erodes our unique aesthetic."
- DISAGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- DISAGREE with "Recycling centers should be moved out of town."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
- DISAGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
- DISAGREE with "County needs to extend water lines in Tuckertown area. About a dozen homes don't have county water or fire hydrants!"
- AGREE with "Too many apartments in Plano. Nice little country setting I bought my home in forever ruined!"
- DISAGREE with "Most drugs except meth should be free & government controlled. See Belgium."
- AGREE with "Allow parents that take their kids out of public schools to use that money in a private school."
- AGREE with "More roundabouts for intersections"
- DISAGREE with "Commitment to healthy lifestyles"
- DISAGREE with "Better/more mass media choices available."
- AGREE with "Allow residence of an area to vote on new developments that might have impact on them opposed to commissioners/magistrates getting kickbacks"
- DISAGREE with "Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green is in need of an ice rink for recreation and sport."
- AGREE with "stronger enforcement of junk cars in yards and trashy looking yards in general"
- AGREE with "The city of Bowling Green should enforce their existing noise ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- DISAGREE with "if there was a law for employers to pay back on bad layoffs and cutbacks"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green should have more healthy/clean eating options for those who have limited diets."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- DISAGREE with "Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe."
- DISAGREE with "Bring a discount grocer to the downtown area."
- AGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"
- DISAGREE with "There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together."
- DISAGREE with "Everyone needs to research (fluoride)...definitely need this to disappear from our water"
- DISAGREE with "City/county gov't. (in all of there forms) must reflect the racial/ethnic city/county population demographic to assist in recruitment/growth"
- AGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler."
- AGREE with "Greek Life should be monitored on WKU's campus."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- AGREE with "The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them."
- AGREE with "There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs."
- AGREE with "Take advantage of the wonderful summers in KY and have more outdoor public swimming spaces"
- AGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- DISAGREE with "Whenever land is bought by the city/county, the seller and amount sold for needs to be transparent, rather than “LLC” as listed seller."
- AGREE with "A traffic light is needed on Cave Mill in front of Natcher School.  Operational on school days, 7:30 to 9 AM & 3 to 4:30 PM."
- AGREE with "Develop the Greenway so that the paved trail is continuous and reaches major parts of the city including the square, WKU, GM, and others."
- AGREE with "Need new schools in Warren County to keep up with population growth, CTE is falling down, Drakes and Greenwood high are way overcrowded"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Bowling Green needs more indoor sports facilities, particularly a large complex with multiple indoor soccer fields, for youth.
prompt:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green should have more healthy/clean eating options for those who have limited diets."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- DISAGREE with "Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe."
- DISAGREE with "Bring a discount grocer to the downtown area."
- AGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"
- DISAGREE with "There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together."
- DISAGREE with "Everyone needs to research (fluoride)...definitely need this to disappear from our water"
- DISAGREE with "City/county gov't. (in all of there forms) must reflect the racial/ethnic city/county population demographic to assist in recruitment/growth"
- AGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler."
- AGREE with "Greek Life should be monitored on WKU's campus."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- AGREE with "The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them."
- AGREE with "There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs."
- AGREE with "Take advantage of the wonderful summers in KY and have more outdoor public swimming spaces"
- AGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- DISAGREE with "Whenever land is bought by the city/county, the seller and amount sold for needs to be transparent, rather than “LLC” as listed seller."
- AGREE with "A traffic light is needed on Cave Mill in front of Natcher School.  Operational on school days, 7:30 to 9 AM & 3 to 4:30 PM."
- AGREE with "Develop the Greenway so that the paved trail is continuous and reaches major parts of the city including the square, WKU, GM, and others."
- AGREE with "Need new schools in Warren County to keep up with population growth, CTE is falling down, Drakes and Greenwood high are way overcrowded"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "Bowling Green needs more indoor sports facilities, particularly a large complex with multiple indoor soccer fields, for youth."? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
test_comment: Bowling Green needs more indoor sports facilities, particularly a large complex with multiple indoor soccer fields, for youth.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- AGREE with "The bypass area must be developed and utilized for new businesses and attractive structures. It is a neglected area that is losing business."
- AGREE with "Cable TV providers should include all local channels."
- AGREE with "When you prioritize the safety of people over automobile speed, all kinds of positive things happen. #slowthecars"
- AGREE with "Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility."
- DISAGREE with "Schools should provide an opportunity for nonswimming parent/guardians to have water safety and swimming lessons in private setting."
- AGREE with "Mandatory, expensive fines should be implemented for littering and illegal dumping."
- AGREE with "the Bark Park needs more trees and water access for the smaller dogs area"
- AGREE with "One should not be able to literally "buy" their way into ability to vote in an election in a locality they do not live in.  $ don't buy vote"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green has many excellent non-public schools; more should be done to make these options available to diverse and low-income families."
- DISAGREE with "People want it all, without paying for anything. A healthy community requires taxes people."
- AGREE with "BG needs to increase recycling and trash bins around the parks and parkways to decrease trash and litter"
- DISAGREE with "Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe."
- AGREE with "Parking on the WKU campus should be more accessible to students and visitors."
- AGREE with "Many people want something for nothing and if they don't get it they steal it instead of working for it.  We are producing a gimme society."
- DISAGREE with "Kentucky and Adams streets should be two-way roads. Adams St. should be zoned commercial, and Kentucky St. should be zoned residential."
- DISAGREE with "Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path"
- DISAGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- DISAGREE with "competition for cable companies and an end to heir price gouging."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Footbridge from airport to across the street. Pilots running across the road."
- AGREE with "Better visibility on roads. Reflectors and better signage"
- AGREE with "WKU should consider building a parking structure at the Chestnut St lot."
- DISAGREE with "Increase Internet/Cell/Phone service throughout the county.  First deal with areas that currently don't have any option."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green  has been monopolized by Houchens.  Limit their growth they own too much of the city for it to be fair to other businesses"
- DISAGREE with "Public school systems need to provide more funding for art education programs, such as music, theater, and visual arts."
- AGREE with "BGDN should publish these BGPD stats weekly – 1) traffic citations 2) vehicle accidents reported; 3) traffic accidents resulting in injury."
- AGREE with "Solving the drug crisis should not mean people with health problems/injuries have to suffer with severe pain."
- AGREE with "Many people want something for nothing and if they don't get it they steal it instead of working for it.  We are producing a gimme society."
- DISAGREE with "Graves Gilbert has created a healthcare monopoly within Bowling Green and the surrounding areas."
- DISAGREE with "We need to offer free full panel STD testing to students and low income families"
- AGREE with "One should not be able to literally "buy" their way into ability to vote in an election in a locality they do not live in.  $ don't buy vote"
- AGREE with "Companies that claim they cannot fill job openings should raise wages and improve working conditions."
- AGREE with "The area of downtown and the riverfront should continue to be developed for entertainment and recreation for both day and night activities."
- DISAGREE with "Rent is too expensive inside the city limits."
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
- AGREE with "I would love to see a Texas Roadhouse in Bowling Green"
- DISAGREE with "Reducing poverty will enhance the quality of life for everyone in our community regardless of status."
- DISAGREE with "For a city of this size, there is too little available in the way of weekend activities for Seniors who are not ready for rocking chairs."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green should have more healthy/clean eating options for those who have limited diets."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: We need more pet stores

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Plan for people, not cars. Walking should be enjoyable, not a hazard."
- AGREE with "More technical education programs for non-graduates of high school"
- DISAGREE with "Spectrum should have competition and not a monopoly. Rates should be regulated by city county government"
- AGREE with "Support non-public (or public charter) school choice options, and make choice viable for families of ALL income levels."
- DISAGREE with "Affordable supports for the elderly and aging population are needed in our community."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green City Commission needs to pass an ordinance banning the sale or use of large fireworks in the city limits."
- DISAGREE with "There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together."
- AGREE with "If people are suggesting more advertising for tourists, there needs to be things for tourists to do."
- AGREE with "I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req"
- DISAGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."
- DISAGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- DISAGREE with "Some of the roads in the city are not wide enough to put sidewalks in but they do anyway catherine dr is ridiculous"
- DISAGREE with "Higher education is intended to help young people develop into informed, well-rounded citizens who contribute positively to society."
- DISAGREE with "We need more pet stores"
- AGREE with "There should be greater checks on our County and City executives. They don't wield too much power but they do wield far too much influence."
- AGREE with "Fines and other enforcement actions should be taken against landlords who don't keep up with their properties."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- AGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
- AGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Need term limits for all local elected officiałs
