subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "We are loosing the city’s long established neighborhoods to multi family developments that do not fit in with the single family residences"
- DISAGREE with "Smoking should not be allowed in public parks."
- AGREE with "Planning & Zoning need to do a better job of listening & working with residents. It's not next to their house, so they don't care!"
- AGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- DISAGREE with "More affordable home ownership options."
- DISAGREE with "Some of the roads in the city are not wide enough to put sidewalks in but they do anyway catherine dr is ridiculous"
- DISAGREE with "City should pay 1.2-1.5m per annum for all homeless k-12 student/families a studio apartment at $500 or less. fund by occ tax move to 1.91%"
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion is a major problem, so studying traffic flow closely is the first step."
- AGREE with "Access Rd, east side of Scottsville Rd. in shopping dist causes congestion. Give right of way to access road or cross streets, not a mix!"
- AGREE with "A round about would be the best solution to improve traffic flow on Fairview Ave at Keriakes Park."
- DISAGREE with "Free WIFI in certain areas - particularly around Fountain Squre"
- AGREE with "I would like to see a sift in city planning and zoning to make BG a more walkable city with better sidewalk planning"
- DISAGREE with "BG can’t compete with Nashville or Louisville for young professionals"
- DISAGREE with "City needs to bar big COs employing from half a dozen temp services to keep 100s ineligble for FMLA due to less than 50 ppl/per 'employer'"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- AGREE with "We need urban planning to ensure that mixed use housing, shopping and new neighborhoods are created to make our community better"
- DISAGREE with "We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful."
- AGREE with "The traffic intersection at Scottsville Rd and Pascoe Blvd needs some immediate attention as far as congestion.  It's very unsafe."
- AGREE with "Expand Nashville Rd all the way past Chaney’s & Buchanan park.  Very dangerous area.. very much so for a school area & young drivers."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Recreational marijuana should be legal.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- DISAGREE with "Working folks need ordinances struck down that prevent them from assembling to bargain for better pay. benefits and working conditions."
- AGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- AGREE with "Emergency protective orders should not be able to be obtained regarding claims of an incident from a year ago."
- DISAGREE with "Smoking should not be allowed within 25 feet of a business."
- AGREE with "Holly drive needs sidewalks"
- DISAGREE with "A kayak trail from Lampkin Park to Barren River. Improved River access."
- DISAGREE with "Law enforcement should send drug possession arrestees for rehabilitation services rather than imprisonment."
- DISAGREE with "Increase green spaces, especially near mall, to decrease congestion and improve "green" status"
- DISAGREE with "Rent is too expensive inside the city limits."
- AGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- DISAGREE with "Schools should provide an opportunity for nonswimming parent/guardians to have water safety and swimming lessons in private setting."
- AGREE with "stronger enforcement of junk cars in yards and trashy looking yards in general"
- AGREE with "The population has out grown the infrastructure in bg/ warren county."
- DISAGREE with "There is no reason not to spend 6 cents per $100 to eliminate homelessness for hundreds of school children."
- AGREE with "Should be an interstate exit for the Woodburn area it could help decrease BG congestion and let people bypass BG all together"
- AGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- DISAGREE with "Have a Dual Slalom Course, Pump Track & Bike Skills Course co-located by the Low Hollow Mountain Bike Trail at Weldon Peete Park."
- AGREE with "Some local politicians abuse their power and get away with more than normal citizens."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Better incorporation of university resources in community, including Kentucky Museum.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe."

- AGREE with "The city of Bowling Green should enforce their existing noise ordinance."

- AGREE with "The bypass area must be developed and utilized for new businesses and attractive structures. It is a neglected area that is losing business."
- AGREE with "Water safety and swim lessons to all k-12 students."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Solving the drug crisis should not mean people with health problems/injuries have to suffer with severe pain."
- AGREE with "People need to do all their research before accusing local officials of using their influence for personal gain."
- AGREE with "We must ensure historic preservation codes are properly enforced in our historic districts; lack of consistency erodes our unique aesthetic."
- AGREE with "If people are suggesting more advertising for tourists, there needs to be things for tourists to do."
- AGREE with "All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green  has been monopolized by Houchens.  Limit their growth they own too much of the city for it to be fair to other businesses"
- AGREE with "Busy roads like the by pass either need turn lanes or block left hand turns except at stop lights."
- DISAGREE with "In order to combat teen pregnancy and STD rates, high schools in Bowling Green should offer comprehensive, medically accurate sex education."
- DISAGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- DISAGREE with "Legalized Marijuana will not only assist Bowling Green in earning Tax revenue but will decrease the strain on our prison system. Win-Win."
- DISAGREE with "Increase green spaces, especially near mall, to decrease congestion and improve "green" status"
- AGREE with "We need urban planning to ensure that mixed use housing, shopping and new neighborhoods are created to make our community better"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should have basic zoning mandates in order to beautify decrepit buildings/gravel lawns/general trashiness."
- DISAGREE with "Need a better way to work with tenants in the downtown district. Too many come and go because they lack business skills."
- DISAGREE with "We need a significantly sized public library branch in the southern end of Warren County near South Warren."
- DISAGREE with "City schools should be redistricted to more evenly distribute the kids."
- DISAGREE with "Drug information classes should be given to incoming freshmen of WKU to educate them about the risks and health hazards."
- AGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
- AGREE with "people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Build more roads!!! Traffic is terrible here for a small city."
- AGREE with "The Barren River water front needs to be improved on both sides of the river and include  canoeing and kayaking water features in the river."
- DISAGREE with "Encourage connection between the wealthy and the poor"
- AGREE with "Local law enforcement would benefit from additional training in community relations."
- DISAGREE with "City/county parks should be focused on creating and maintain green places for residents to join.Avoid cement parking and adding buildings"
- DISAGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
- DISAGREE with "An unmanned trolley system, possibly solar, might be better long term than buses for some areas."
- DISAGREE with "There should be no punishment for small amounts of marijuana possession, in my opinion"
- AGREE with "Access Rd, east side of Scottsville Rd. in shopping dist causes congestion. Give right of way to access road or cross streets, not a mix!"
- AGREE with "Solving the drug crisis should not mean people with health problems/injuries have to suffer with severe pain."
- AGREE with "Allow parents that take their kids out of public schools to use that money in a private school."
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- DISAGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- AGREE with "Work needs to be done on improving litter pick up and encouraging people dispose of their litter correctly."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- AGREE with "BG needs to install traffic cameras that help police intersections like Gallatin, TN.  This would reduce accidents, traffic flow and add $"
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
- DISAGREE with "Most drugs except meth should be free & government controlled. See Belgium."
- AGREE with "Bowling green needs to work in beautifying the city . More Boulvard like roads with planted flowers and reducing overhead utility clusters."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "install traffic cameras and enforce running of stop lights. more traffic enforcement means more $$$ for the city."
- AGREE with "Judge/prosecutors should not let influential family of victim push extraordinarily harsh sentences & create more victims, ruined young lives"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- DISAGREE with "There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together."
- AGREE with "Make it a walking city. Sidewalks along the main avenues (scottsville rd, campbell ln, 31 bypass) with plants, benches, art pieces."

- AGREE with "Mandatory, expensive fines should be implemented for littering and illegal dumping."
- DISAGREE with "Need engaging art installations throughout the city. People will be able to experience art, have fun, and share on social media."
- AGREE with "Warren county needs to be more proactive about keeping their county maps up to date of new roads or developments especially online. (Google)"
- DISAGREE with "We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new."
- DISAGREE with "A kayak trail from Lampkin Park to Barren River. Improved River access."
- DISAGREE with "There are not enough family-centered activities to do down town."
- DISAGREE with "Need a better way to work with tenants in the downtown district. Too many come and go because they lack business skills."
- DISAGREE with "We need more pet stores"
- AGREE with "All students in Warren county should have the best available education, not the Kentucky minimum, at all times."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "We need well planned service roads, instead of so many driveways directly on streets like Campbell Lane and the By pass."
- DISAGREE with "We need a significantly sized public library branch in the southern end of Warren County near South Warren."
- AGREE with "All students in Warren county should have the best available education, not the Kentucky minimum, at all times."
- AGREE with "Need new schools in Warren County to keep up with population growth, CTE is falling down, Drakes and Greenwood high are way overcrowded"
- DISAGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- DISAGREE with "Human trafficking in Bowling Green needs to be investigated by the FBI before it becomes a larger problem swept under the rug."
- AGREE with "Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation"

- AGREE with "Why isn't Nashville Rd between the roundabout and Campbell Ln wider? Getting stuck there at 5 o'clock is a plague."

- AGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "Parents should be able to send their kids to the school district of their choice no matter where they live in Bowling Green/Warren County."
- DISAGREE with "There should be gender-neutral housing options on WKU's campus for LGBTQ+ students."
- DISAGREE with "Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path"

- AGREE with "Bowling Green is in need of an ice rink for recreation and sport."
- AGREE with "Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$."
- AGREE with "We need more regulation of opioid drugs, both prescribed and illicit."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

- AGREE with "WKU and local community colleges should continue to offer courses that interest those seeking an education, whether or not the courses aid in job placement."
- AGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- DISAGREE with "Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut."
- AGREE with "Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways."
- AGREE with "Go to underground utilities. Scottsville rd and the by-pass look awful."
- AGREE with "Impact on traffic flow should be considered with any proposed new developments."
- DISAGREE with "More green spaces. All of our parks have just become sports complexes!"
- DISAGREE with "High sugar items like pop tarts and chocolate muffins should not be a part of the public school breakfast menu"
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
- DISAGREE with "Institutionalize racism is alive and well here. I know because I have experienced it first hand. We need to have a plan."
- DISAGREE with "City/county gov't. (in all of there forms) must reflect the racial/ethnic city/county population demographic to assist in recruitment/growth"
- AGREE with "We need more regulation of opioid drugs, both prescribed and illicit."
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- AGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- AGREE with "Do SOMETHING about completing the "wrap" downtown, or at least enhance (and that includes restaurant service) what is currently there."
- DISAGREE with "We  a true junior college which offers credit / non credit courses like many other states from basket weaving to cyber security"
- AGREE with "City/County officials with connections to a project or proposal should abstain from voting on the project or proposal."
- DISAGREE with "A kayak trail from Lampkin Park to Barren River. Improved River access."
- DISAGREE with "Apartments for 55 and older that are upscale and lovely."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "We need a 6 day a week farmer's market that is open at least 5 hours -"
- AGREE with "Fireworks use in residential areas is out of control with no police presence to enforce the already in place restrictions."
- AGREE with "We have an estimated 125,000 people but we still don't have a hospital that is trauma center and have to ship everyone to TN or Louisville."
- DISAGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
- DISAGREE with "I should be allowed to keep my yard & home in any manner I please."
- DISAGREE with "apartment complexes should be required to participate in recycling program"
- AGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- DISAGREE with "All public schools should have an adequate summer feeding program so no child goes hungry."
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
- DISAGREE with "The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work"
- DISAGREE with "BGDN should publish each month the number of job positions filled / people employed through the Workforce Development Board’s efforts."
- AGREE with "There needs to be a stoplight at the intersection of Shive Lane and Ken Bale Blvd to improve traffic flow. The backups there are awful."
- AGREE with "Make all future sidewalks wide enough for multi-use (walking, biking, skateboarding etc)"
- DISAGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green has many excellent non-public schools; more should be done to make these options available to diverse and low-income families."
- DISAGREE with "If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget."
- AGREE with "Consistent, once a month testing of our emergency sirens, not just before potential bad weather."
- AGREE with "There should be officers more readily available to the county areas; ex. for domestic violence disputes."
- AGREE with "Mandatory, expensive fines should be implemented for littering and illegal dumping."
- AGREE with "Pass a no animals in a hot car ordinance."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place.
(2) Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required.
(3) With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Stronger tenant and renters rights. Landlord accountability for keeping properties in good shape. So many overpriced dilapidated rentals.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- AGREE with "Oversight committees for projects such as TIF. Elected officials should not be able to sit on unelected boards."
- DISAGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- AGREE with "Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources"
- AGREE with "The entire bypass area is an eyesore and there needs to be a concerted effort like a TIF to revitalize this crucial part of town."
- DISAGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- DISAGREE with "Sidewalks are needed along Gary Farms Blvd"
- DISAGREE with "More gender-neutral bathrooms need to be seen across BG on WKU's campus, in local businesses, etc."
- DISAGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- AGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
- AGREE with "We need a fiber option for internet."
- DISAGREE with "Minimum wage required for businesses to receive tax credits should be raised to a living wage"
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- AGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- DISAGREE with "If private schools were to get a share of Federal or State education dollars, it would hurt public schools."
- AGREE with "Recycling services need to be expanded & improved. With growing population, think of how much land will become dump sites...Ridiculous!"
- AGREE with "many parts of the By-pass can and should be widened"
- AGREE with "The city and county school systems should merge."
- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Oversight committees for projects such as TIF. Elected officials should not be able to sit on unelected boards.
(2) Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards.
(3) Unelected school board officials should not have the power to create, add, or increase "school taxes".
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Oversight committees for projects such as TIF. Elected officials should not be able to sit on unelected boards."
- AGREE with "Our sidewalks need more connectivity. It's too piecemealed and makes some areas unusable."
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- AGREE with "We need a fiber option for internet."
- AGREE with "Louisville rd area needs more businesses and restaurants extending out towards the factories to also bring in revenue from Edmonson Co."
- DISAGREE with "Sidewalks are needed along Gary Farms Blvd"
- DISAGREE with "Parking in apartment subdivisions  should monitored closely by police. Parking on subdivision streets shouldn't be allowed."
- AGREE with "The intersection of Scottsville road and entrance to Greenview Hospital needs to be widened"
- AGREE with "Local law enforcement would benefit from additional training in community relations."
- DISAGREE with "More concerts should be held in Bowling Green"
- DISAGREE with "There is no reason not to spend 6 cents per $100 to eliminate homelessness for hundreds of school children."
- DISAGREE with "More gender-neutral bathrooms need to be seen across BG on WKU's campus, in local businesses, etc."
- DISAGREE with "We need a WHOLE FOOD store."
- DISAGREE with "Working folks need ordinances struck down that prevent them from assembling to bargain for better pay. benefits and working conditions."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- AGREE with "City/County officials with connections to a project or proposal should abstain from voting on the project or proposal."
- AGREE with "Our city should make a bid for Google Fiber to help compete with Spectrum and AT&T."
- AGREE with "We need look for a Natcher connection on Three Springs or Elrod Rd"
- DISAGREE with "More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Oversight committees for projects such as TIF. Elected officials should not be able to sit on unelected boards.
(2) Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards.
(3) Unelected school board officials should not have the power to create, add, or increase "school taxes".
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe."
- DISAGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- AGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- AGREE with "Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards."
- AGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- DISAGREE with "There is no reason not to spend 6 cents per $100 to eliminate homelessness for hundreds of school children."
- AGREE with "City/County officials with connections to a project or proposal should abstain from voting on the project or proposal."
- DISAGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- DISAGREE with "More public transportation options--be creative"
- DISAGREE with "More gender-neutral bathrooms need to be seen across BG on WKU's campus, in local businesses, etc."
- DISAGREE with "A city should have the right to declare itself a sanctuary city."
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
- AGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."
- DISAGREE with "More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green  has been monopolized by Houchens.  Limit their growth they own too much of the city for it to be fair to other businesses"
- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Oversight committees for projects such as TIF. Elected officials should not be able to sit on unelected boards.
(2) Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards.
(3) Unelected school board officials should not have the power to create, add, or increase "school taxes".
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- DISAGREE with "We need look for a Natcher connection on Three Springs or Elrod Rd"
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- DISAGREE with "Local fuel prices need to investigated."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- AGREE with "New developments should help pay to widen the roads in the areas where they are increasing traffic."
- DISAGREE with "We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful."
- AGREE with "When you prioritize the safety of people over automobile speed, all kinds of positive things happen. #slowthecars"
- DISAGREE with "Build more roads!!! Traffic is terrible here for a small city."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs ev car charging stations. There are none available unless you own a Tesla."
- AGREE with "New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place."
- AGREE with "There isn’t enough here to draw young families. We need a beautification of the riverfront and a more walkable city for young professionals"
- AGREE with "Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path"
- AGREE with "The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships."
- DISAGREE with "The Bowling Green/Warren County Airport needs to be relocated outside of the city limits."
- AGREE with "Every new apartment building should have shaded parklike space for refreshment of its tenants"
- DISAGREE with "many parts of the By-pass can and should be widened"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- DISAGREE with "We  a true junior college which offers credit / non credit courses like many other states from basket weaving to cyber security"
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Higher education is intended to help young people develop into informed, well-rounded citizens who contribute positively to society.
(2) Highway exits spur development, which would likely lead to undesireable suburban sprawl.
(3) Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Wish the airport would get better flights. WheelsUp was cool but need more locations. Sad Owensboro is so far ahead there.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."

- AGREE with "Smoking should not be allowed in public parks."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
- AGREE with "A clean, efficient public transportation system would be a huge help to those with limited ability or desire to drive."
- DISAGREE with "Shopping should be spread across all four corners of the county, so the traffic on Scottsville rd and Campbell lane will be improved."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green has many excellent non-public schools; more should be done to make these options available to diverse and low-income families."
- DISAGREE with "Bring a discount grocer to the downtown area."
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "We  a true junior college which offers credit / non credit courses like many other states from basket weaving to cyber security"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- DISAGREE with "Local fuel prices need to investigated."
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- AGREE with "New developments should help pay to widen the roads in the areas where they are increasing traffic."
- AGREE with "We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements."
- DISAGREE with "many parts of the By-pass can and should be widened"
- AGREE with "The arts are an important component of K-12 education."
- DISAGREE with "We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now."
- AGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- AGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- AGREE with "I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req"
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- AGREE with "Higher education is intended to help young people develop into informed, well-rounded citizens who contribute positively to society."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Higher education is intended to help young people develop into informed, well-rounded citizens who contribute positively to society.
(2) Legalizing marijuana at the state level could produce substantial tax revenue, but if only BG did, it would cause problems.
(3) Animated digital business signs are a road hazard. They distract drivers.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: If private schools were to get a share of Federal or State education dollars, it would hurt public schools.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path"
- DISAGREE with "The entire bypass area is an eyesore and there needs to be a concerted effort like a TIF to revitalize this crucial part of town."
- DISAGREE with "Greenwood Mall should be remodeled to attract more buyers."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green has many excellent non-public schools; more should be done to make these options available to diverse and low-income families."
- AGREE with "Regulate the size & brightness of business signs."
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."
- AGREE with "People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation."
- AGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- DISAGREE with "We need to promote competition in town for Charter. AT&T isn't much better and doesn't serve everywhere. Need more fiber to the homes."
- AGREE with "Increase green spaces, especially near mall, to decrease congestion and improve "green" status"
- AGREE with "Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources"
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- AGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Build parking areas."
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- DISAGREE with "We already have a lot of parks. And the libraries have become a hangout for the homeless.  Do something about that problem first"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Legalizing marijuana at the state level could produce substantial tax revenue, but if only BG did, it would cause problems.
(2) Highway exits spur development, which would likely lead to undesireable suburban sprawl.
(3) Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree

- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "Build parking areas."
- AGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- AGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- AGREE with "Go to underground utilities. Scottsville rd and the by-pass look awful."
- AGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- AGREE with "We need more incentives for individual and business solar power"
- AGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "People need to do all their research before accusing local officials of using their influence for personal gain."

- DISAGREE with "We are loosing the city’s long established neighborhoods to multi family developments that do not fit in with the single family residences"

- AGREE with "Water safety and swim lessons to all k-12 students."
- AGREE with "More local produce should be incorporated into public school's lunchrooms"
- AGREE with "An unmanned trolley system, possibly solar, might be better long term than buses for some areas."
- DISAGREE with "It is easy to find a good job in Warren County."
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- DISAGREE with "Need a traffic signal on Cave Mill in front of Natcher School, operating 8-9 AM, 3:30-4:30."
- AGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "Pass a No animals on chains in the county."
- AGREE with "There should be more cooperation between WKU and Bowling Green, especially for things like internships and community involvement."
- DISAGREE with "Fountain Square is experiencing an increase in aggressive panhandling, BGPD needs to establish their presence for citizen's safety."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- AGREE with "Better public transit and runs 24 /7 so people without cars can get to work. Also more stops added in residential areas."
- AGREE with "We need look for a Natcher connection on Three Springs or Elrod Rd"
- DISAGREE with "The very low number of immigrants coming to our county last year was a good thing. Saves costs: Schools, courts, social services-Our taxes!"
- AGREE with "Holly drive needs sidewalks"
- AGREE with "Birth control should be an OTC drug- access to it in Kentucky and in Bowling Green is limited for many women."
- DISAGREE with "I should be allowed to keep my yard & home in any manner I please."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- AGREE with "Post-secondary training programs for special education students."

- DISAGREE with "Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis."
- AGREE with "WRECC should provide internet services."
- DISAGREE with "Animated digital business signs are a road hazard. They distract drivers."
- AGREE with "WKU should upgrade their CIT program to keep up with the times"
- AGREE with "Some local politicians abuse their power and get away with more than normal citizens."
- DISAGREE with "Everyone needs to research (fluoride)...definitely need this to disappear from our water"
- AGREE with "Fewer students per teacher should be a rule. No more than 20; ideal class size of 15. Plenty of teachers are looking for work."
- DISAGREE with "Need a traffic signal on Cave Mill in front of Natcher School, operating 8-9 AM, 3:30-4:30."
- DISAGREE with "Fountain Square is experiencing an increase in aggressive panhandling, BGPD needs to establish their presence for citizen's safety."
- DISAGREE with "There needs to be a stoplight at the intersection of Shive Lane and Ken Bale Blvd to improve traffic flow. The backups there are awful."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler.
(2) Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "We need more regulation of opioid drugs, both prescribed and illicit."

- DISAGREE with "The Bowling Green Daily News is too politically slanted."
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana at the state level could produce substantial tax revenue, but if only BG did, it would cause problems."
- AGREE with "Educate high schoolers on their options after they graduate"
- DISAGREE with "We are loosing the city’s long established neighborhoods to multi family developments that do not fit in with the single family residences"
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- AGREE with "Recycling should be encouraged by not charging for the service"
- AGREE with "We need a real bus system."
- DISAGREE with "There needs to be a stoplight at the intersection of Shive Lane and Ken Bale Blvd to improve traffic flow. The backups there are awful."
- AGREE with "High sugar items like pop tarts and chocolate muffins should not be a part of the public school breakfast menu"
- DISAGREE with "A private (catholic) high school would be beneficial to all."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler.
(2) There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs.
(3) Our city should make a bid for Google Fiber to help compete with Spectrum and AT&T.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- AGREE with "We need to renovate the run down businesses and store fronts, instead of building new places"
- AGREE with "Traffic improvement on the so-called Bypass.  Most cities actually have a bypass.  Bowling Green doesn't have one."
- DISAGREE with "We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it."
- DISAGREE with "Multi-use sidewalks should have fixtures for skateboards, bikes like small ramps etc."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "Stronger tenant and renters rights. Landlord accountability for keeping properties in good shape. So many overpriced dilapidated rentals."
- DISAGREE with "I still have to drive out of town to eat Golden Corral."
- AGREE with "The population has out grown the infrastructure in bg/ warren county."
- DISAGREE with "The very low number of immigrants coming to our county last year was a good thing. Saves costs: Schools, courts, social services-Our taxes!"
- DISAGREE with "A private (catholic) high school would be beneficial to all."
- AGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- AGREE with "Consistent, once a month testing of our emergency sirens, not just before potential bad weather."
- AGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- DISAGREE with "The face of drug dealers has changed. Today most opioid drug dealers are doctors or teenagers in the suburbs ordering from China."
- AGREE with "A kayak trail from Lampkin Park to Barren River. Improved River access."
- AGREE with "Support more local chefs and brewers! White Squirrel is fantastic and I want to see more of it in BG!"
- DISAGREE with "Everyone needs to research (fluoride)...definitely need this to disappear from our water"
- DISAGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
- DISAGREE with "The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements.
(2) Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility.
(3) There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Working folks need ordinances struck down that prevent them from assembling to bargain for better pay. benefits and working conditions.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Bowling Green's refugee, immigrant, and international student population improves the university and the community."
- DISAGREE with "Government should ignore criminal malfeasance/embezzlement of public funds by anyone if little or no funds can be recovered."
- DISAGREE with "Some of the roads in the city are not wide enough to put sidewalks in but they do anyway catherine dr is ridiculous"
- DISAGREE with "We are loosing the city’s long established neighborhoods to multi family developments that do not fit in with the single family residences"
- AGREE with "We must ensure historic preservation codes are properly enforced in our historic districts; lack of consistency erodes our unique aesthetic."
- DISAGREE with "Allow parents that take their kids out of public schools to use that money in a private school."
- AGREE with "Widen Cemetry Road, Russellville Road, Lover’s Lane, Campbell Lane, The Old ByPass, and Scotsville Road from old ByPass to Natcher Parkway."
- AGREE with "Higher paying jobs- the ability to move up with reasonable raises."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- DISAGREE with "Some local doctors order too many tests."
- AGREE with "More technical education programs for non-graduates of high school"
- AGREE with "SKYPAC needs to bring in younger, more entertaining acts. It will fall apart if they keep only catering to 50+. Could be a great venue."
- AGREE with "Access Rd, east side of Scottsville Rd. in shopping dist causes congestion. Give right of way to access road or cross streets, not a mix!"
- AGREE with "Complete the ky. 185 restructuring project."
- AGREE with "You shouldn't be required to pay County taxes if you live in the City (but not the other way around). It makes no sense."
- DISAGREE with "The very low number of immigrants coming to our county last year was a good thing. Saves costs: Schools, courts, social services-Our taxes!"
- AGREE with "Make Scott Waste follow their contract - Return trash cans next to the house and not leave them on the sidewalks.  Keep BG clean!"
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- DISAGREE with "Fountain Square is experiencing an increase in aggressive panhandling, BGPD needs to establish their presence for citizen's safety."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility.
(2) There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs.
(3) Our city should make a bid for Google Fiber to help compete with Spectrum and AT&T.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Developing more bike trails into surrounding areas of the city would allow for a more developed both transport and recreational experiences

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "The arts are an important component of K-12 education."
- AGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- AGREE with "We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Graves Gilbert has created a healthcare monopoly within Bowling Green and the surrounding areas."
- DISAGREE with "Reduce and/or get rid of the city wage tax."
- AGREE with "Pass an ordinance that requires pet owners to pay a fee if their pets are not fixed."
- DISAGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
- DISAGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- AGREE with "With a circle, widen Fairview with a left-turn lane west of cemetery."
- AGREE with "The Barren River water front needs to be improved on both sides of the river and include  canoeing and kayaking water features in the river."
- DISAGREE with "Emphasize that ALL immigrants should learn and speak ENGLLISH."
- AGREE with "Widen Cemetry Road, Russellville Road, Lover’s Lane, Campbell Lane, The Old ByPass, and Scotsville Road from old ByPass to Natcher Parkway."
- AGREE with "It should be mandatory for all homes/businesses to have visible marking on mailbox and building for their address."
- AGREE with "Louisville rd area needs more businesses and restaurants extending out towards the factories to also bring in revenue from Edmonson Co."
- DISAGREE with "KASPER is an invasion of privacy that contradicts what HIPAA regulations try to protect."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- AGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- DISAGREE with "Recycling centers should be moved out of town."
- AGREE with "The access roads off Scottsville Rd are terrible. They provide constant traffic jams and can be dangerous. We need to budget to fix them."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- DISAGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- AGREE with "Cutting a major sports program would be the best way for WKU to deal with budget cuts without harming academics."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Busy roads like the by pass either need turn lanes or block left hand turns except at stop lights.
(2) We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn.
(3) We need to grow the internet infrastructure particularly in growing areas of the county like Alvaton.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- AGREE with "We need more activities for families, such as a large-scale all-in-one kids play arena like All About Kids."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- AGREE with "The airport should be moved to the transpark."

- AGREE with "Curbside Recycling and/or Recycle Center in South Warren County"
- AGREE with "Arts-based charter schools"
- DISAGREE with "If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money."
- DISAGREE with "Insist that schools at all levels have daily physical activity  for all students to help combat the childhood obesity crisis."

- AGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."

- DISAGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."

- AGREE with "More technical education programs for non-graduates of high school"
- AGREE with "There should be more healthy food options near/on campus of WKU."
- DISAGREE with "Lower taxes by auditing every department for total accountability & make cuts where possible. Stop city government waste."
- DISAGREE with "We need more businesses like White Squirrel and Nats in BG. They add character to our town. Done with the Olive Garden and Belks."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Other counties have school at home on snow days so that kids do not have to make up days.  This should be considered for here.
(2) Should be an interstate exit for the Woodburn area it could help decrease BG congestion and let people bypass BG all together
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- AGREE with "Mesonet provides valuable and protective weather information and funding for it should not be cut."
- AGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more pet-friendly housing options for renters."
- DISAGREE with "The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work"
- DISAGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green would be better if it didn't have the "Good Ole Boy" system among so many."
- AGREE with "Human trafficking in Bowling Green needs to be investigated by the FBI before it becomes a larger problem swept under the rug."
- AGREE with "Rental assistance programs"
- AGREE with "Develop the Greenway so that the paved trail is continuous and reaches major parts of the city including the square, WKU, GM, and others."
- DISAGREE with "install traffic cameras and enforce running of stop lights. more traffic enforcement means more $$$ for the city."
- AGREE with "It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive cable rates."
- DISAGREE with "I believe BGISD and WCS should be combined to lower tax payer overheads of multi-administration wastages"
- DISAGREE with "I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets."
- AGREE with "Local elected government officials should not be able to hold a seat and also be on the TIF board or other unelected boards."
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "I think we have enough restaurants."
- DISAGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- DISAGREE with "A way to improve Bowling Green and the surrounding areas is to improve traffic flow & circulation by limiting the number of traffic lights."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Other counties have school at home on snow days so that kids do not have to make up days.  This should be considered for here.
(2) Public school could do alternate teaching styles(like Montessori) in a school within a school set up.  Not all kids learn the same way.
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: When the city tears up lawns with projects they should be required to do what it takes so that lawns are same quality they were before.

Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."

- DISAGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
- AGREE with "Provide accessible transportation for seniors that have difficulty driving"
- DISAGREE with "The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work"
- DISAGREE with "We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it."
- AGREE with "Mesonet provides valuable and protective weather information and funding for it should not be cut."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- DISAGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to pass a resolution in support of medical cannabis."
- AGREE with "Better incorporation of university resources in community, including Kentucky Museum."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Other counties have school at home on snow days so that kids do not have to make up days.  This should be considered for here.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req"
- DISAGREE with "Pass an ordinance that requires pet owners to pay a fee if their pets are not fixed."
- AGREE with "We need more activities for families, such as a large-scale all-in-one kids play arena like All About Kids."
- DISAGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."
- DISAGREE with "I believe BGISD and WCS should be combined to lower tax payer overheads of multi-administration wastages"
- AGREE with "More walking/nature trails in our sports-centric parks. Have certain hours where walkers can enjoy the beauty of Paul Walker Golf Course."
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- AGREE with "Impact on traffic flow should be considered with any proposed new developments."
- DISAGREE with "Busy roads like the by pass either need turn lanes or block left hand turns except at stop lights."
- DISAGREE with "Emphasize that ALL immigrants should learn and speak ENGLLISH."
- AGREE with "The Bowling Green/Warren County Airport needs to be relocated outside of the city limits."
- DISAGREE with "SKYPAC needs to bring in younger, more entertaining acts. It will fall apart if they keep only catering to 50+. Could be a great venue."
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- AGREE with "Animated digital business signs are a road hazard. They distract drivers."
- AGREE with "We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG."
- AGREE with "Build parking garage behind Spencer’s, remove some parking from Ft. Square. Add a green space on top of garage! Soccer field or rooftop food"
- AGREE with "The city & county school districts need to be re-evaluated The yards/houses that touch Potter Grays playground r all County school districts"
- DISAGREE with "If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money."
- AGREE with "Too many apartments in Plano. Nice little country setting I bought my home in forever ruined!"
- DISAGREE with "When you prioritize the safety of people over automobile speed, all kinds of positive things happen. #slowthecars"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) High sugar items like pop tarts and chocolate muffins should not be a part of the public school breakfast menu
(2) Public school could do alternate teaching styles(like Montessori) in a school within a school set up.  Not all kids learn the same way.
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Support non-public (or public charter) school choice options, and make choice viable for families of ALL income levels."
- AGREE with "City and county parks departments should provide more programming for adults and seniors."
- AGREE with "Warren county needs to be "wet". The city is wet but the county is dry."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
- AGREE with "There should be a push to improve mental health awareness and availability in Bowling Green."
- AGREE with "There is no reason not to spend 6 cents per $100 to eliminate homelessness for hundreds of school children."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs stricter code enforcement on property use and condition in some neighborhoods."
- DISAGREE with "Shopping should be spread across all four corners of the county, so the traffic on Scottsville rd and Campbell lane will be improved."
- DISAGREE with "The population has out grown the infrastructure in bg/ warren county."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- DISAGREE with "Lower taxes by auditing every department for total accountability & make cuts where possible. Stop city government waste."
- DISAGREE with "I believe BGISD and WCS should be combined to lower tax payer overheads of multi-administration wastages"
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- AGREE with "Bike lanes that are wide enough to safely ride on without fear of being hit by passing cars."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "Businesses and multi-family dwellings should be required to offer and use recycling services."
- AGREE with "New developments should not be approved unless roads and infrastructure capable of handling them are in place."
- DISAGREE with "We need a WHOLE FOOD store."
- AGREE with "many parts of the By-pass can and should be widened"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Should be an interstate exit for the Woodburn area it could help decrease BG congestion and let people bypass BG all together
(2) High sugar items like pop tarts and chocolate muffins should not be a part of the public school breakfast menu
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
