subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "City residents do not receive adequate return on County Taxes paid."
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets."
- AGREE with "The entire bypass area is an eyesore and there needs to be a concerted effort like a TIF to revitalize this crucial part of town."
- AGREE with "County needs to extend water lines in Tuckertown area. About a dozen homes don't have county water or fire hydrants!"
- AGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- AGREE with "There should be more effort put into teaching students about any potential harmful side effects of drugs, illegal or otherwise."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to pass a resolution in support of medical cannabis."
- AGREE with "Fines and other enforcement actions should be taken against landlords who don't keep up with their properties."
- AGREE with "With jails crowded, it seems many are first time offenders of crimes that hurt no one, nor property. Seems rehab would be better."
- DISAGREE with "Vaping should not be added to the smoking ordinance."
- AGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "More gender-neutral bathrooms need to be seen across BG on WKU's campus, in local businesses, etc."
- DISAGREE with "Shopping should be spread across all four corners of the county, so the traffic on Scottsville rd and Campbell lane will be improved."
- AGREE with "Concerts and performing arts activities must reflect the diverse racial/ethnic demographic of the city/county."
- DISAGREE with "BGDN should publish these BGPD stats weekly – 1) traffic citations 2) vehicle accidents reported; 3) traffic accidents resulting in injury."
- DISAGREE with "A way to improve Bowling Green and the surrounding areas is to improve traffic flow & circulation by limiting the number of traffic lights."
- AGREE with "city needs to work on water run off when we have a lot of rain.. to many places flood on roadways makes driving very dangerous.."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options.
(2) Should be an interstate exit for the Woodburn area it could help decrease BG congestion and let people bypass BG all together
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- AGREE with "Greenwood Mall should be remodeled to attract more buyers."

- DISAGREE with "There should be no punishment for small amounts of marijuana possession, in my opinion"

- AGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."

(2) some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options.
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Raise drivers license from 16 to 18 and IMPROVE DRIVERS ED CLASSES in High schools  Believe me they are pitiful."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- AGREE with "Support more local chefs and brewers! White Squirrel is fantastic and I want to see more of it in BG!"
- AGREE with "The rental market prices are well beyond an affordable housing level and needs to be addressed given the number of renters in BG."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."
- AGREE with "BGDN should publish each month the number of job positions filled / people employed through the Workforce Development Board’s efforts."
- DISAGREE with "Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler."
- DISAGREE with "City residents do not receive adequate return on County Taxes paid."
- AGREE with "It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city."
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana would be a boon for the economy."
- AGREE with "Pass a no animals in a hot car ordinance."
- AGREE with "We need to replace "Room at the Inn" services with temporary decent housing connected to aid agencies for the homeless"
- AGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- AGREE with "There should never be a leash law in the county - neighborhood dogs protect, play with and teach kids. It was a factor in living in county."
- DISAGREE with "I believe BGISD and WCS should be combined to lower tax payer overheads of multi-administration wastages"
- DISAGREE with "If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money."
- DISAGREE with "We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to pass a resolution in support of medical cannabis."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) High sugar items like pop tarts and chocolate muffins should not be a part of the public school breakfast menu
(2) Public school could do alternate teaching styles(like Montessori) in a school within a school set up.  Not all kids learn the same way.
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Allow residence of an area to vote on new developments that might have impact on them opposed to commissioners/magistrates getting kickbacks"
- DISAGREE with "The city and county school systems should merge."
- DISAGREE with "We need a WHOLE FOOD store."
- AGREE with "Indoor swimming pools for public use and therapy year around without time restrictions due to special swim leagues. Encourage healthier life"
- AGREE with "Emergency protective orders should not be able to be obtained regarding claims of an incident from a year ago."
- AGREE with "City/county gov't. (in all of there forms) must reflect the racial/ethnic city/county population demographic to assist in recruitment/growth"
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- AGREE with "Better/more mass media choices available."
- DISAGREE with "You shouldn't be required to pay County taxes if you live in the City (but not the other way around). It makes no sense."
- AGREE with "Big names and corporations get away with too much. We need fairer regulation and level playing fields for the small and big guys alike."
- AGREE with "More gender-neutral bathrooms need to be seen across BG on WKU's campus, in local businesses, etc."
- DISAGREE with "BGDN should publish these BGPD stats weekly – 1) traffic citations 2) vehicle accidents reported; 3) traffic accidents resulting in injury."
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- DISAGREE with "Pass an ordinance that requires pet owners to pay a fee if their pets are not fixed."
- AGREE with "After school activity centers for youth with later hours of operation."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."
- DISAGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Other counties have school at home on snow days so that kids do not have to make up days.  This should be considered for here.
(2) Public school could do alternate teaching styles(like Montessori) in a school within a school set up.  Not all kids learn the same way.
(3) Community Education provides after-school care necessary to working parents.  Funding should not be cut.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money.

- DISAGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "Relax restrictions on fencing in Home Owners Associations to promote people keeping animals on leashes or in fenced yards."? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
test_comment: Relax restrictions on fencing in Home Owners Associations to promote people keeping animals on leashes or in fenced yards.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Insist that schools at all levels have daily physical activity  for all students to help combat the childhood obesity crisis."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "Birth control should be an OTC drug- access to it in Kentucky and in Bowling Green is limited for many women."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."
- AGREE with "City/county parks should be focused on creating and maintain green places for residents to join.Avoid cement parking and adding buildings"

- AGREE with "BGMU needs to offer residential fiber internet as a UTILITY, using Chattanooga as a perfect example."
- DISAGREE with "Legalized Marijuana will not only assist Bowling Green in earning Tax revenue but will decrease the strain on our prison system. Win-Win."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- AGREE with "There are large fees with the few currently available indoor pools."
- DISAGREE with "stronger enforcement of junk cars in yards and trashy looking yards in general"
- DISAGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."
- AGREE with "Planning & Zoning Board needs an overhaul. Fewer builders appointed, fairness to opposition, stop rubber stamping by P&Z and City Comm."
- AGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Other counties have school at home on snow days so that kids do not have to make up days.  This should be considered for here.
(2) some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options.
(3) Should be an interstate exit for the Woodburn area it could help decrease BG congestion and let people bypass BG all together
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- DISAGREE with "Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty"
- DISAGREE with "Law enforcement should send drug possession arrestees for rehabilitation services rather than imprisonment."
- DISAGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- DISAGREE with "some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive internet rates."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more opportunities for the arts and sciences in the Housing Authority so the students there can rise above!"
- AGREE with "Five lane Cemetery Road from Interchange to By Pass, except four lanes through the Cemetery with median prohibiting left turns."
- AGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- AGREE with "The airport should be moved to the transpark."
- DISAGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- DISAGREE with "City should bar non-competes, similar to North Dakota/California, as driving destitution in non-tenure work force. Be heroic destination."
- DISAGREE with "The arts are an important component of K-12 education."
- AGREE with "Work needs to be done on improving litter pick up and encouraging people dispose of their litter correctly."
- AGREE with "Work,with State to complete a wide loop from Scottsville Road across N I65 to N Natcher Pk way."
- AGREE with "Increase green spaces, especially near mall, to decrease congestion and improve "green" status"
- AGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- DISAGREE with "Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources"
- AGREE with "Sidewalks are needed along Gary Farms Blvd"
- AGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.
(2) install traffic cameras and enforce running of stop lights. more traffic enforcement means more $$$ for the city.
(3) I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."
- DISAGREE with "Regulate the size & brightness of business signs."
- AGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "We need a real bus system."
- AGREE with "I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir."
- DISAGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
- DISAGREE with "Institutionalize racism is alive and well here. I know because I have experienced it first hand. We need to have a plan."
- DISAGREE with "We need more businesses like White Squirrel and Nats in BG. They add character to our town. Done with the Olive Garden and Belks."
- DISAGREE with "some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options."
- AGREE with "We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new."
- AGREE with "Trains blocking major roads, stopping, and shutting down all traffic. This problem needs to be solved."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- DISAGREE with "SKYPAC needs to bring in younger, more entertaining acts. It will fall apart if they keep only catering to 50+. Could be a great venue."
- AGREE with "Noise ordinances should be enacted and enforced in the county as they are in the city."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more aid for the homeless whether: tiny house park, health clinic, rehabilitation, job readiness sources."
- DISAGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- AGREE with "City/county officials should disclose to the public via Daily News all connections they have to a project or proposal well before the vote."
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- AGREE with "Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city."
- AGREE with "City needs to mandate temp services furnish details of how much they are selling employee labor for, to the employee."
- AGREE with "Should be an interstate exit for the Woodburn area it could help decrease BG congestion and let people bypass BG all together"
- DISAGREE with "City should pay 1.2-1.5m per annum for all homeless k-12 student/families a studio apartment at $500 or less. fund by occ tax move to 1.91%"
- DISAGREE with "Reducing poverty will enhance the quality of life for everyone in our community regardless of status."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways.
(2) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.
(3) I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways.

".Would the person agree with this: "Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills."? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
test_comment: Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- DISAGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "City had 109 homeless students in 2017, County Had 112.  Housing those families temporarily is worth raising tax rate from 1.85% to 1.91%."
- AGREE with "Too many apartments in Plano. Nice little country setting I bought my home in forever ruined!"
- AGREE with "It is easy to find a good job in Warren County."
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
- AGREE with "Driver’s education needs to be more thorough and mandatory before 16 year olds are even allowed to drive home from the courthouse."
- AGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."

- AGREE with "Bring a discount grocer to the downtown area."
- DISAGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- DISAGREE with "There isn’t enough here to draw young families. We need a beautification of the riverfront and a more walkable city for young professionals"
- DISAGREE with "If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money."
- AGREE with "Institute a business development grant that encourages WKU grads to stay in Bowling Green by starting local businesses."
- DISAGREE with "The Smokey Bones entrance off of Scottsville Road is extremely dangerous and needs a traffic light."
- AGREE with "All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more opportunities for the arts and sciences in the Housing Authority so the students there can rise above!"
- DISAGREE with "Multi-use sidewalks should have fixtures for skateboards, bikes like small ramps etc."
- AGREE with "Junking up highways/roadways with signs should not be the primary way tourism is promoted."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways.
(3) I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Most journalists strive to be factual and unbiased, whether or not they succeed in all their writing,"
- DISAGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."
- AGREE with "It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city."
- AGREE with "I think we have enough restaurants."
- AGREE with "All students in Warren county should have the best available education, not the Kentucky minimum, at all times."
- AGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- DISAGREE with "The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships."
- DISAGREE with "Arts-based charter schools"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green is an excellent place to raise a family, shop, worship, get an education, and recreate. I feel safe in most places here in BG."
- DISAGREE with "There is no reason not to spend 6 cents per $100 to eliminate homelessness for hundreds of school children."
- AGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- AGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- DISAGREE with "We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG."
- AGREE with "More public transportation options--be creative"
- DISAGREE with "There should never be a leash law in the county - neighborhood dogs protect, play with and teach kids. It was a factor in living in county."
- AGREE with "Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road."
- AGREE with "It would be great if people in neighborhoods could get to know each other better and neighborhoods were like small communities of neighbors."
- DISAGREE with "Trick or treating should last longer after dark. Many decorations don't show til then. Also start later, parents can't get home in time!"
- DISAGREE with "Officials that use social media accounts in a professional capacity should not be allowed to block constituents except under rare conditions like being threatened."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.
(3) install traffic cameras and enforce running of stop lights. more traffic enforcement means more $$$ for the city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: City had 109 homeless students in 2017, County Had 112.  Housing those families temporarily is worth raising tax rate from 1.85% to 1.91%.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Plan for people, not cars. Walking should be enjoyable, not a hazard."
- DISAGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."
- AGREE with "Better incorporation of university resources in community, including Kentucky Museum."
- DISAGREE with "Graves Gilbert has created a healthcare monopoly within Bowling Green and the surrounding areas."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- AGREE with "Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security"
- AGREE with "Need new schools in Warren County to keep up with population growth, CTE is falling down, Drakes and Greenwood high are way overcrowded"
- DISAGREE with "The entire bypass area is an eyesore and there needs to be a concerted effort like a TIF to revitalize this crucial part of town."
- AGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- DISAGREE with "If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money."
- AGREE with "Planning & Zoning need to do a better job of listening & working with residents. It's not next to their house, so they don't care!"
- AGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- AGREE with "The intersection of Scottsville road and entrance to Greenview Hospital needs to be widened"
- AGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- DISAGREE with "There is no reason not to spend 6 cents per $100 to eliminate homelessness for hundreds of school children."
- DISAGREE with "I feel Bowling Green could benefit with an additional ambulance service.  Quicker response, and possibly a lower payment when used."
- DISAGREE with "We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements."
- DISAGREE with "With drug use being so prevalent in Warren county, better treatment options need to be offered."
- AGREE with "Junking up highways/roadways with signs should not be the primary way tourism is promoted."
- AGREE with "We already have a lot of parks. And the libraries have become a hangout for the homeless.  Do something about that problem first"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways.
(3) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Fewer students per teacher should be a rule. No more than 20; ideal class size of 15. Plenty of teachers are looking for work.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Our city should make a bid for Google Fiber to help compete with Spectrum and AT&T."
- DISAGREE with "More sidewalks would be great, but first let’s stop people parking on them.  Or stop spending money building them.  Whichever."
- DISAGREE with "Plan for people, not cars. Walking should be enjoyable, not a hazard."
- DISAGREE with "We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements."
- AGREE with "Some of the roads in the city are not wide enough to put sidewalks in but they do anyway catherine dr is ridiculous"
- DISAGREE with "City should bar non-competes, similar to North Dakota/California, as driving destitution in non-tenure work force. Be heroic destination."
- DISAGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- DISAGREE with "parks and rec should promote and support pickleball for older citizens"
- AGREE with "big projeck in city sould be vote by people"
- AGREE with "We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new."
- AGREE with "An unmanned trolley system, possibly solar, might be better long term than buses for some areas."
- DISAGREE with "KASPER is an invasion of privacy that contradicts what HIPAA regulations try to protect."
- AGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- DISAGREE with "Arts-based charter schools"
- DISAGREE with "If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money."
- DISAGREE with "Greenwood Mall should be remodeled to attract more buyers."
- AGREE with "Some county roads, such as Hammett Hill Road, are so narrow it's hard for two cars to pass. Surely they could make them a little wider."
- AGREE with "Local law enforcement would benefit from additional training in community relations."
- AGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways.
(2) install traffic cameras and enforce running of stop lights. more traffic enforcement means more $$$ for the city.
(3) I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Most journalists strive to be factual and unbiased, whether or not they succeed in all their writing,

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options."
- AGREE with "A clean, efficient public transportation system would be a huge help to those with limited ability or desire to drive."
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- AGREE with "BG needs more Summer weekend festivals/activities"
- DISAGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- DISAGREE with "Law enforcement should send drug possession arrestees for rehabilitation services rather than imprisonment."
- DISAGREE with "With jails crowded, it seems many are first time offenders of crimes that hurt no one, nor property. Seems rehab would be better."
- AGREE with "There should be something a work farm for local prisoners to learn to tend gardens, take care of livestock, and learn to be more useful."
- DISAGREE with "Footbridge from airport to across the street. Pilots running across the road."
- DISAGREE with "Houston "courtesy police" maintain safety on access rds enforcing right of way & parking/litter rules, assist traffic flow - we need!"
- AGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- AGREE with "Big names and corporations get away with too much. We need fairer regulation and level playing fields for the small and big guys alike."
- DISAGREE with "There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs."
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- AGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- DISAGREE with "Make all future sidewalks wide enough for multi-use (walking, biking, skateboarding etc)"
- AGREE with "Apartments for 55 and older that are upscale and lovely."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- DISAGREE with "Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation"
- AGREE with "People want it all, without paying for anything. A healthy community requires taxes people."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "The city of Bowling Green should enforce their existing noise ordinance."
- AGREE with "Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road."
- AGREE with "many parts of the By-pass can and should be widened"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- DISAGREE with "More sidewalks would be great, but first let’s stop people parking on them.  Or stop spending money building them.  Whichever."
- AGREE with "Term limits should be initiated on county executives."
- DISAGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more aid for the homeless whether: tiny house park, health clinic, rehabilitation, job readiness sources."
- AGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- AGREE with "Work needs to be done on improving litter pick up and encouraging people dispose of their litter correctly."
- AGREE with "We should think about moving the airport. Too much high dollar land going to waste right now."
- DISAGREE with "Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation"
- DISAGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
- AGREE with "We need look for a Natcher connection on Three Springs or Elrod Rd"
- AGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
- DISAGREE with "7% of Paker-Bennett &  3.7% of Bristow homeless. I will pay 6 cents per $100 income to end homelessness for school-age families via Apt. $"
- DISAGREE with "The arts are an important component of K-12 education."
- AGREE with "County volunteer fire departments need to be upgraded to fit the current population of Warren County."
- DISAGREE with "There are intersections such as the access road along Scottsville that to be reworked, possibly into roundabout or similar designs."
- DISAGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) install traffic cameras and enforce running of stop lights. more traffic enforcement means more $$$ for the city.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "More technical education programs for non-graduates of high school"
- AGREE with "Recycling centers should be moved out of town."
- DISAGREE with "The city and county school systems should merge."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs ev car charging stations. There are none available unless you own a Tesla."
- AGREE with "City/County schools should have a minimum one year classroom for immigrant and refugee students so they can learn english, culture and laws"
- DISAGREE with "Houston "courtesy police" maintain safety on access rds enforcing right of way & parking/litter rules, assist traffic flow - we need!"
- DISAGREE with "There should be more opportunities for the arts and sciences in the Housing Authority so the students there can rise above!"
- AGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- DISAGREE with "The feeder road at Shive Lane and Scottsville Road need to be closed off. It is very dangerous."
- DISAGREE with "We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability."
- DISAGREE with "There isn’t enough here to draw young families. We need a beautification of the riverfront and a more walkable city for young professionals"
- DISAGREE with "There should never be a leash law in the county - neighborhood dogs protect, play with and teach kids. It was a factor in living in county."
- AGREE with "Why isn't Nashville Rd between the roundabout and Campbell Ln wider? Getting stuck there at 5 o'clock is a plague."
- AGREE with "Work,with State to complete a wide loop from Scottsville Road across N I65 to N Natcher Pk way."
- AGREE with "Human trafficking in Bowling Green needs to be investigated by the FBI before it becomes a larger problem swept under the rug."
- AGREE with "I think we have enough restaurants."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."
- AGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways.
(3) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: The intersection of Scottsville road and entrance to Greenview Hospital needs to be widened

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG."
- AGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- AGREE with "Wish the airport would get better flights. WheelsUp was cool but need more locations. Sad Owensboro is so far ahead there."
- DISAGREE with "Some local doctors order too many tests."
- AGREE with "many parts of the By-pass can and should be widened"
- AGREE with "District judges are biased towards large local companies to the detriment of individuals."
- DISAGREE with "There are too many traffic lights in parts of Bowling Green (for instance, Scottsville Road)."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green would be better if it didn't have the "Good Ole Boy" system among so many."
- AGREE with "Better ordinances on keeping animals on leashes or in fenced areas are needed."
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- DISAGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."
- DISAGREE with "Only a traffic circle at Kereiakes Park on Fairview Ave. is required."
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
- AGREE with "The money I earn & spend is all done within the city limits but as a county resident I have NO voice/vote in city politics. Needs to change!"
- AGREE with "Recruit and retain the best k-13 teachers graduating from WKU"
- AGREE with "One should not be able to literally "buy" their way into ability to vote in an election in a locality they do not live in.  $ don't buy vote"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive cable rates."
- DISAGREE with "We need urban planning to ensure that mixed use housing, shopping and new neighborhoods are created to make our community better"
- DISAGREE with "Make it a walking city. Sidewalks along the main avenues (scottsville rd, campbell ln, 31 bypass) with plants, benches, art pieces."
- DISAGREE with "We need more businesses like White Squirrel and Nats in BG. They add character to our town. Done with the Olive Garden and Belks."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.
(3) install traffic cameras and enforce running of stop lights. more traffic enforcement means more $$$ for the city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Go to underground utilities. Scottsville rd and the by-pass look awful."
- AGREE with "City residents do not receive adequate return on County Taxes paid."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- AGREE with "Developing more bike trails into surrounding areas of the city would allow for a more developed both transport and recreational experiences"
- DISAGREE with "We need urban planning to ensure that mixed use housing, shopping and new neighborhoods are created to make our community better"
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- DISAGREE with "It is embarrassing that our city is the largest in the state not to have a fairness ordinance."
- DISAGREE with "Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources"
- AGREE with "Recruit and retain the best k-13 teachers graduating from WKU"
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see a sift in city planning and zoning to make BG a more walkable city with better sidewalk planning"
- AGREE with "Develop a manufacturing Work training program for jail inmates that qualify"
- DISAGREE with "The feeder road at Shive Lane and Scottsville Road need to be closed off. It is very dangerous."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive internet rates."
- AGREE with "I would like to see the WKU psych and Medical programs collaborate on mental health research, which is so sadly lacking in today's society."
- AGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
- DISAGREE with "SKYPAC needs to bring in younger, more entertaining acts. It will fall apart if they keep only catering to 50+. Could be a great venue."
- DISAGREE with "Reducing poverty will enhance the quality of life for everyone in our community regardless of status."
- AGREE with "Consider asking low-income or disabled residents what they really need."
- AGREE with "People need to do all their research before accusing local officials of using their influence for personal gain."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) people need to understand that a STOP sign means STOP, not just slow down and keep going.
(2) Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways.
(3) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Big names and corporations get away with too much. We need fairer regulation and level playing fields for the small and big guys alike.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "A senior living community, designed for 50+ residents rather than 75+ & in failing health residents, is needed — and apparently ignored."
- DISAGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."

- DISAGREE with "The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- DISAGREE with "We need a health food store."

- AGREE with "Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$."
- AGREE with "Recycling services need to be expanded & improved. With growing population, think of how much land will become dump sites...Ridiculous!"
- AGREE with "Traffic improvement on the so-called Bypass.  Most cities actually have a bypass.  Bowling Green doesn't have one."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
- DISAGREE with "Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe."
- DISAGREE with "More sidewalks would be great, but first let’s stop people parking on them.  Or stop spending money building them.  Whichever."
- AGREE with "I regularly discuss politics with people I disagree with."
- AGREE with "Downtown redevelopment should retain accessible parking for existing businesses."
- AGREE with "City/county parks should be focused on creating and maintain green places for residents to join.Avoid cement parking and adding buildings"
- DISAGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- DISAGREE with "We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Police do a shameful job of enforcing traffic laws. more tickets = more compliance and more $$$$$.

(3) I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- AGREE with "Smoking should not be allowed within 25 feet of a business."

- DISAGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
- AGREE with "Bike lanes that are wide enough to safely ride on without fear of being hit by passing cars."
- DISAGREE with "Judge/prosecutors should not let influential family of victim push extraordinarily harsh sentences & create more victims, ruined young lives"
- AGREE with "There should be officers more readily available to the county areas; ex. for domestic violence disputes."
- DISAGREE with "Emergency protective orders should not be able to be obtained regarding claims of an incident from a year ago."
- AGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- AGREE with "We should have a commuting service between here & Nashville."
- DISAGREE with "Support non-public (or public charter) school choice options, and make choice viable for families of ALL income levels."
- AGREE with "There should be more cooperation between WKU and Bowling Green, especially for things like internships and community involvement."
- AGREE with "Police should not focus on Public Intoxication charges for people walking home. We should encourage people to walk -- not drive drunk."
- DISAGREE with "The city & county school districts need to be re-evaluated The yards/houses that touch Potter Grays playground r all County school districts"
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- DISAGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- AGREE with "Local food and small farms are one of BG best attractions."
- DISAGREE with "WKU should consider building a parking structure at the Chestnut St lot."
- AGREE with "Arts education should be available in every school in Warren County and other surrounding areas."
- AGREE with "Recycling services need to be expanded & improved. With growing population, think of how much land will become dump sites...Ridiculous!"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation.

(3) The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets."
- AGREE with "Build and improve sidewalks in the area of Magnolia Street and 13th to Cabell Drive area for the heavy pedestrian traffic there."
- DISAGREE with "The city & county school districts need to be re-evaluated The yards/houses that touch Potter Grays playground r all County school districts"
- DISAGREE with "Judge/prosecutors should not let influential family of victim push extraordinarily harsh sentences & create more victims, ruined young lives"
- DISAGREE with "Build more roads!!! Traffic is terrible here for a small city."
- DISAGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir."
- AGREE with "There need to be harsher punishments for WKU campus rapes/sexual assaults."
- AGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- DISAGREE with "Cable TV providers should include all local channels."
- AGREE with "Law enforcement in Bowling Green and Warren county needs more minority representation"
- AGREE with "Better public transit and runs 24 /7 so people without cars can get to work. Also more stops added in residential areas."
- AGREE with "Increase green spaces, especially near mall, to decrease congestion and improve "green" status"
- DISAGREE with "Build parking areas."
- AGREE with "Parents should be able to send their kids to the school district of their choice no matter where they live in Bowling Green/Warren County."
- AGREE with "Continue downtown development to the river.  Tourists always seek out parks & restaurants near water."
- AGREE with "Fireworks use in residential areas is out of control with no police presence to enforce the already in place restrictions."
- DISAGREE with "Arts-based charter schools"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city.
(2) It would be great if people in neighborhoods could get to know each other better and neighborhoods were like small communities of neighbors.
(3) The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Recycling services need to be improved and modernized. Current contractor uses outdated equipment, services are messy, company unresponsive."
- AGREE with "More public transportation options--be creative"
- DISAGREE with "Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways."
- AGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- AGREE with "Most journalists strive to be factual and unbiased, whether or not they succeed in all their writing,"
- DISAGREE with "Judge/prosecutors should not let influential family of victim push extraordinarily harsh sentences & create more victims, ruined young lives"
- DISAGREE with "I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets."
- AGREE with "More healthy restaurants"
- AGREE with "More walking/nature trails in our sports-centric parks. Have certain hours where walkers can enjoy the beauty of Paul Walker Golf Course."
- DISAGREE with "Emergency protective orders should not be able to be obtained regarding claims of an incident from a year ago."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- AGREE with "Bike lanes that are wide enough to safely ride on without fear of being hit by passing cars."
- AGREE with "Downtown redevelopment should retain accessible parking for existing businesses."
- DISAGREE with "Vaping should not be added to the smoking ordinance."
- AGREE with "City/county gov't. (in all of there forms) must reflect the racial/ethnic city/county population demographic to assist in recruitment/growth"
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- AGREE with "Birth control should be an OTC drug- access to it in Kentucky and in Bowling Green is limited for many women."
- DISAGREE with "Support non-public (or public charter) school choice options, and make choice viable for families of ALL income levels."
- DISAGREE with "The city & county school districts need to be re-evaluated The yards/houses that touch Potter Grays playground r all County school districts"
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city.
(2) The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships.
(3) The arts enrich our city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "I see a lot of folks with expired tags on cars, both in state and out of state. Police need to enforce the laws and write more tickets."
- AGREE with "Planning and zoning laws should change to encourage small businesses and farms."
- AGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- AGREE with "Owners of large parking lots should be required to break them up with pockets of green space and trees; perhaps create a walkable green path"
- AGREE with "Require 4 yr HS lifeskills class, how to: family finance, file tax, repair/maintain car, repair/maintain home, cook/sew, apply/interview job"
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
- DISAGREE with "People should not be allowed to bring their pets every place or store they go to."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- AGREE with "All new and existing sidewalks should have shade trees"
- AGREE with "More gender-neutral bathrooms need to be seen across BG on WKU's campus, in local businesses, etc."
- AGREE with "Publicizing more cultural activities other than the Bowling Green International Festival."
- DISAGREE with "24hr parks would be a huge, and relatively inexpensive, benefit for the many people in our community who work 2nd and 3rd shifts."
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- AGREE with "The area of downtown and the riverfront should continue to be developed for entertainment and recreation for both day and night activities."
- DISAGREE with "We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- DISAGREE with "Whenever land is bought by the city/county, the seller and amount sold for needs to be transparent, rather than “LLC” as listed seller."
- DISAGREE with "More free meeting space for nonprofits."
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city.
(2) The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships.
(3) The arts enrich our city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "Emergency protective orders should not be able to be obtained regarding claims of an incident from a year ago."
- DISAGREE with "Cable TV providers should include all local channels."
- DISAGREE with "Build parking areas."

Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city.
(2) The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships.
(3) The arts enrich our city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
- AGREE with "There should be a push to improve mental health awareness and availability in Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "Judge/prosecutors should not let influential family of victim push extraordinarily harsh sentences & create more victims, ruined young lives"
- AGREE with "Warren county needs to be more proactive about keeping their county maps up to date of new roads or developments especially online. (Google)"

- DISAGREE with "Older neighborhoods change from owner occupied to rental.  Deterioration occurs.  Stronger landlord/tenant laws needed!"
- AGREE with "Institute a business development grant that encourages WKU grads to stay in Bowling Green by starting local businesses."
- DISAGREE with "Schools should provide an opportunity for nonswimming parent/guardians to have water safety and swimming lessons in private setting."
- DISAGREE with "The homeless population is getting out of hand. We need to find better methods for curtailing and rehabing and keeping them off the streets."
- AGREE with "Other counties have school at home on snow days so that kids do not have to make up days.  This should be considered for here."
- AGREE with "Like Steamers but hate they ruined that historic building"
- DISAGREE with "More free meeting space for nonprofits."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "Connect business parking lots to reduce unnecessary traffic on main roadways"
- AGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- DISAGREE with "Emphasize that ALL immigrants should learn and speak ENGLLISH."
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city.
(2) The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships.
(3) The arts enrich our city.
".Would the person agree with this: "We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability."? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
test_comment: We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Require businesses to pick up litter they and their customers generate."
- AGREE with "The city and county work together to keep the low socieconomic status children out of certain schools. This reduces learning opportunities."

- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- AGREE with "We need more incentives for individual and business solar power"
- AGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- DISAGREE with "24hr parks would be a huge, and relatively inexpensive, benefit for the many people in our community who work 2nd and 3rd shifts."
- DISAGREE with "Emphasize that ALL immigrants should learn and speak ENGLLISH."
- DISAGREE with "BGMU needs to be held accountable for their rates and "averages.""
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."

- AGREE with "American comfort and avoidance of any pain or suffering drives the drug dependency problem."

- AGREE with "Arts education should be available in every school in Warren County and other surrounding areas."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."

(3) The arts enrich our city.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "I hope BG can one day link the short, scattered bicycle paths."
- AGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"

- DISAGREE with "We need an NBA team. I think we should put the arena where the airport is. Think about it."
- DISAGREE with "Either do the speed limit or get over to the right, to many SLOW, out of county drivers clogging up the roadways."
- AGREE with "Provide a food assistance program for college students as students lots of times do not qualify for food stamps due to living on campus"
- AGREE with "Every railroad crossing needs an elevating arm. Too many near accidents for something so inexpensive."
- AGREE with "More public transportation options--be creative"
- DISAGREE with "Older neighborhoods change from owner occupied to rental.  Deterioration occurs.  Stronger landlord/tenant laws needed!"
- DISAGREE with "Build parking areas."
- AGREE with "Legalized Marijuana will not only assist Bowling Green in earning Tax revenue but will decrease the strain on our prison system. Win-Win."
- AGREE with "More creative learning classes"
- DISAGREE with "Judge/prosecutors should not let influential family of victim push extraordinarily harsh sentences & create more victims, ruined young lives"
- DISAGREE with "The very low number of immigrants coming to our county last year was a good thing. Saves costs: Schools, courts, social services-Our taxes!"
- DISAGREE with "More roundabouts for intersections"
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- DISAGREE with "Schools should provide an opportunity for nonswimming parent/guardians to have water safety and swimming lessons in private setting."
- DISAGREE with "The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work"
- AGREE with "Hawaii outlaws billboards tokeep the landscape from being blocked I would love to see Bowling Green billboard free"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city.
(2) People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation.
(3) The university and city should develop stronger mutually beneficial partnerships.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- DISAGREE with "There should never be a leash law in the county - neighborhood dogs protect, play with and teach kids. It was a factor in living in county."
- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "When you prioritize the safety of people over automobile speed, all kinds of positive things happen. #slowthecars"
- AGREE with "We need more businesses like White Squirrel and Nats in BG. They add character to our town. Done with the Olive Garden and Belks."
- AGREE with "Local fuel prices need to investigated."
- DISAGREE with "Homelessness is for the nonprofit sector to deal with, not government."
- DISAGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- AGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- AGREE with "BG has a bad problem with littering.  My husband and I fill up to 5 recycle bins every week between downtown and campus, cleaning it all up."
- AGREE with "Too many apartments in Plano. Nice little country setting I bought my home in forever ruined!"
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- AGREE with "More public transportation options--be creative"
- DISAGREE with "Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city."
- AGREE with "BG needs to install traffic cameras that help police intersections like Gallatin, TN.  This would reduce accidents, traffic flow and add $"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should try to emulate Owensboro's Friday night programs downtown."
- AGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."
- AGREE with "Multi-use sidewalks should have fixtures for skateboards, bikes like small ramps etc."
- DISAGREE with "WKU should consider building a parking structure at the Chestnut St lot."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL.
(2) If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k.
(3) All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree

- DISAGREE with "The feeder road at Shive Lane and Scottsville Road need to be closed off. It is very dangerous."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Cutting a major sports program would be the best way for WKU to deal with budget cuts without harming academics."

- DISAGREE with "BG Parks needs more funding  from City"
- AGREE with "People in Bowling Green should not be discriminated against based on their sexual orientation."
- DISAGREE with "WKU should consider building a parking structure at the Chestnut St lot."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir.
(2) All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
