subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Cops are overzealous in BG. So little crime they try to create trouble. Need to ease off. This city is plenty safe."
- AGREE with "Work,with State to complete a wide loop from Scottsville Road across N I65 to N Natcher Pk way."
- AGREE with "Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- AGREE with "Build parking areas."
- AGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- AGREE with "We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem."
- AGREE with "BG can link/support hotel/food, recreational/cultural venues in a Tourism Passport, giving discounts when at least 3 are purchased together."
- DISAGREE with "Create pedestrian-only streets."
- DISAGREE with "BG Parks needs more funding  from City"
- AGREE with "In order to better combat the opioid epidemic, it is time to view drug addiction as a health problem rather than a criminal justice problem."
- DISAGREE with "Graves Gilbert has created a healthcare monopoly within Bowling Green and the surrounding areas."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to enforce the separation of church and state and impose taxes on churches that politic from the pulpit"
- AGREE with "There isn’t enough here to draw young families. We need a beautification of the riverfront and a more walkable city for young professionals"
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- AGREE with "We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new."
- DISAGREE with "Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city."
- DISAGREE with "Prevent the development of new housing areas, especially in farm land areas."
- AGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
- DISAGREE with "There should never be a leash law in the county - neighborhood dogs protect, play with and teach kids. It was a factor in living in county."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL.
(2) All schools in the county and city should work together to provide the same minimum level of education to students.
(3) Fewer students per teacher should be a rule. No more than 20; ideal class size of 15. Plenty of teachers are looking for work.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: The money I earn & spend is all done within the city limits but as a county resident I have NO voice/vote in city politics. Needs to change!

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "You shouldn't be required to pay County taxes if you live in the City (but not the other way around). It makes no sense."
- AGREE with "many parts of the By-pass can and should be widened"
- DISAGREE with "We need to make it worthwhile for builders to create more quality affordable rental units for residents, rather than more luxury units."
- AGREE with "We need to focus more on the existing housing in BG, including renovations and improvements."
- DISAGREE with "A favorite place to visit (elsewhere) is a park filled with gently used toys (donated).  It inspires imagination, creativity and sharing."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green City Commission needs to pass an ordinance banning the sale or use of large fireworks in the city limits."
- AGREE with "Take advantage of the wonderful summers in KY and have more outdoor public swimming spaces"
- AGREE with "I hope BG can one day link the short, scattered bicycle paths."
- DISAGREE with "With jails crowded, it seems many are first time offenders of crimes that hurt no one, nor property. Seems rehab would be better."
- AGREE with "Encourage connection between the wealthy and the poor"
- DISAGREE with "Traffic and toxic vehicle dependency should NOT be a topic of priority for this city."
- DISAGREE with "Greenwood Mall should be remodeled to attract more buyers."
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- AGREE with "Big names and corporations get away with too much. We need fairer regulation and level playing fields for the small and big guys alike."
- AGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
- DISAGREE with "It is easy to find a good job in Warren County."
- AGREE with "New home zoning should be for single family dwellings rather than multi-family units (apartments)."
- AGREE with "I regularly discuss politics with people I disagree with."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- AGREE with "When resurfacing a roadway, attention should be given to making the manhole covers level with the new surface."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir.
(2) More youth programs are needed to bring the community together: volunteer organizations, community service, innovative creations labs
(3) All students in Warren county should have the best available education, not the Kentucky minimum, at all times.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: City/County officials with connections to a project or proposal should abstain from voting on the project or proposal.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Create pedestrian-only streets."
- AGREE with "People want it all, without paying for anything. A healthy community requires taxes people."
- AGREE with "Sidewalks are needed along Gary Farms Blvd"
- AGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- AGREE with "The city and county school systems should merge."
- DISAGREE with "BG Parks needs more funding  from City"
- DISAGREE with "The fact that there is not as much coverage about African American deaths from cocaine as there is about deaths in the white community from opioids, even though there are as many of them, is evidence of institutionalized racism."
- AGREE with "Driving in this town very dangerous, Drivers Education classes should be required for all new drivers!!!"
- AGREE with "7% of Paker-Bennett &  3.7% of Bristow homeless. I will pay 6 cents per $100 income to end homelessness for school-age families via Apt. $"
- DISAGREE with "Greenwood Mall should be remodeled to attract more buyers."
- DISAGREE with "A favorite place to visit (elsewhere) is a park filled with gently used toys (donated).  It inspires imagination, creativity and sharing."
- AGREE with "Bowling green needs to work in beautifying the city . More Boulvard like roads with planted flowers and reducing overhead utility clusters."
- DISAGREE with "some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options."
- AGREE with "Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road."
- AGREE with "Recruit and retain the best k-13 teachers graduating from WKU"
- AGREE with "Actually teach HS students useful things."
- DISAGREE with "When you prioritize the safety of people over automobile speed, all kinds of positive things happen. #slowthecars"
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- DISAGREE with "The population has out grown the infrastructure in bg/ warren county."
- DISAGREE with "Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget.
(2) If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k.
(3) I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "It should not take 3 months to get a gynecologist appointment in this city."
- DISAGREE with "KASPER is an invasion of privacy that contradicts what HIPAA regulations try to protect."
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- DISAGREE with "Opinion pieces without a specific author make it more confusing to determine whether a media source is biased or not."
- AGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs ev car charging stations. There are none available unless you own a Tesla."
- DISAGREE with "Some local doctors order too many tests."
- DISAGREE with "We need a health food store."
- DISAGREE with "some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options."
- DISAGREE with "The feeder road at Shive Lane and Scottsville Road need to be closed off. It is very dangerous."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green City Commission needs to pass an ordinance banning the sale or use of large fireworks in the city limits."
- AGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- AGREE with "A senior living community, designed for 50+ residents rather than 75+ & in failing health residents, is needed — and apparently ignored."
- DISAGREE with "I would love to see a Texas Roadhouse in Bowling Green"
- AGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- AGREE with "Our local immigrant population has, overall, been a benefit to our city and county."
- AGREE with "Apartments for 55 and older that are upscale and lovely."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Fewer students per teacher should be a rule. No more than 20; ideal class size of 15. Plenty of teachers are looking for work.
(2) I would like to see the WKU psych and Medical programs collaborate on mental health research, which is so sadly lacking in today's society.
(3) All students in Warren county should have the best available education, not the Kentucky minimum, at all times.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Institute a business development grant that encourages WKU grads to stay in Bowling Green by starting local businesses.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- AGREE with "Refugee neighbors enrich our city's landscape and we should find more ways to welcome and integrate them into the life of the city."
- AGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- AGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- AGREE with "Allow residence of an area to vote on new developments that might have impact on them opposed to commissioners/magistrates getting kickbacks"

- AGREE with "Industrial hemp should be re-legalized to grow in Kentucky."
- AGREE with "No family should be homeless in Bowling Green / Warren County, and it is up to our officials to make sure they have options for shelter."
- DISAGREE with "Cutting a major sports program would be the best way for WKU to deal with budget cuts without harming academics."
- DISAGREE with "It is easy to find a good job in Warren County."
- AGREE with "We need look for a Natcher connection on Three Springs or Elrod Rd"
- DISAGREE with "BG Parks needs more funding  from City"
- AGREE with "The Kentucky Career Center on Chestnut is a great resource to locate employment."
- DISAGREE with "Like Steamers but hate they ruined that historic building"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green & Warren Co. should consolidate into a metro."
- DISAGREE with "Create pedestrian-only streets."
- AGREE with "Need more bike lanes and biker friendly resources"
- DISAGREE with "A favorite place to visit (elsewhere) is a park filled with gently used toys (donated).  It inspires imagination, creativity and sharing."
- DISAGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL.
(2) I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir.
(3) I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "The feeder road at Shive Lane and Scottsville Road need to be closed off. It is very dangerous."
- AGREE with "Our city should make a bid for Google Fiber to help compete with Spectrum and AT&T."
- AGREE with "There should be more officers observing intersections."
- AGREE with "We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability."
- DISAGREE with "It is easy to find a good job in Warren County."
- AGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- DISAGREE with "The money I earn & spend is all done within the city limits but as a county resident I have NO voice/vote in city politics. Needs to change!"
- AGREE with "There should be more opportunities for the arts and sciences in the Housing Authority so the students there can rise above!"
- AGREE with "Local government, for profit and non profits should work together on housing and economic equality"
- DISAGREE with "some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options."

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- AGREE with "I would like to see more aid for the homeless whether: tiny house park, health clinic, rehabilitation, job readiness sources."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- DISAGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- AGREE with "We need a real bus system."
- AGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- AGREE with "Zoning changes should only be made with the consent of a majority of the neighbors in the affected area."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "I would love to see a Texas Roadhouse in Bowling Green"
- AGREE with "Better ordinances on keeping animals on leashes or in fenced areas are needed."
- AGREE with "The city and county school systems should merge."
- DISAGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
- DISAGREE with "Local schools should help make up the pension fund crisis by learning to live with budget cuts."
- AGREE with "We need more mixed-use developments so people live closely to all basic needs. Mix business and residential zones and increase walkability."
- AGREE with "There are no public adult swim facilities in Bowling Green for year around physical use. The Lovers Lane Complex should be made available"
- DISAGREE with "The population has out grown the infrastructure in bg/ warren county."
- DISAGREE with "A favorite place to visit (elsewhere) is a park filled with gently used toys (donated).  It inspires imagination, creativity and sharing."
- DISAGREE with "Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills."
- AGREE with "Mandatory, expensive fines should be implemented for littering and illegal dumping."
- AGREE with "Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road."
- DISAGREE with "The money I earn & spend is all done within the city limits but as a county resident I have NO voice/vote in city politics. Needs to change!"
- AGREE with "Downtown redevelopment should retain accessible parking for existing businesses."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green City Commission needs to pass an ordinance banning the sale or use of large fireworks in the city limits."
- DISAGREE with "Downtown at the square and adjacent areas should be a pedestrian mall"
- AGREE with "Bowling green needs to work in beautifying the city . More Boulvard like roads with planted flowers and reducing overhead utility clusters."
- AGREE with "Institute a business development grant that encourages WKU grads to stay in Bowling Green by starting local businesses."
- DISAGREE with "The main purpose of higher education is job training."
- AGREE with "County volunteer fire departments need to be upgraded to fit the current population of Warren County."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget.
(2) If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k.
(3) I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "More roundabouts for intersections"
- DISAGREE with "City residents do not receive adequate return on County Taxes paid."
- DISAGREE with "Big names and corporations get away with too much. We need fairer regulation and level playing fields for the small and big guys alike."
- DISAGREE with "All new and existing single family housing should have at least one shade tree planting"
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see the WKU psych and Medical programs collaborate on mental health research, which is so sadly lacking in today's society."
- AGREE with "City should pay 1.2-1.5m per annum for all homeless k-12 student/families a studio apartment at $500 or less. fund by occ tax move to 1.91%"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs Community Enrichment Classes that include woodworking, welding, gardening and general home beautification for hobbyist."
- AGREE with "Local companies that can't fill job openings should recruit from parts of KY w/ high unemployment & pay relocation expenses."
- DISAGREE with "fines for leaving dog feces in public areas needs to be enforced"
- DISAGREE with "Recycling services need to be expanded & improved. With growing population, think of how much land will become dump sites...Ridiculous!"
- AGREE with "Louisville rd area needs more businesses and restaurants extending out towards the factories to also bring in revenue from Edmonson Co."
- AGREE with "No family should be homeless in Bowling Green / Warren County, and it is up to our officials to make sure they have options for shelter."
- AGREE with "Doctors who prescribe pain and tranquilizing meds too easily fuel the drug dependency crisis."
- DISAGREE with "Better enforcement of traffic violations. Too many running red lights, parking in fire lanes, cell phone usage while driving"
- AGREE with "Rental assistance programs"
- DISAGREE with "There should be something a work farm for local prisoners to learn to tend gardens, take care of livestock, and learn to be more useful."
- AGREE with "Warren county needs to be more proactive about keeping their county maps up to date of new roads or developments especially online. (Google)"
- DISAGREE with "We need to offer free full panel STD testing to students and low income families"
- AGREE with "Human trafficking in Bowling Green needs to be investigated by the FBI before it becomes a larger problem swept under the rug."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) City had 109 homeless students in 2017, County Had 112.  Housing those families temporarily is worth raising tax rate from 1.85% to 1.91%.
(2) 7% of Paker-Bennett &  3.7% of Bristow homeless. I will pay 6 cents per $100 income to end homelessness for school-age families via Apt. $
(3) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Actually teach HS students useful things.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Drivers tests in BG should test over the rules of a turnabout."
- DISAGREE with "There should be a push to improve mental health awareness and availability in Bowling Green."
- DISAGREE with "Greenwood Mall parking lot could become a cooperative solar collection for itself and home surrounding"
- AGREE with "The downtown parking garage has been an eyesore for years. It's embarrassing, so fix it!"
- DISAGREE with "Consistent, once a month testing of our emergency sirens, not just before potential bad weather."
- DISAGREE with "There should be something a work farm for local prisoners to learn to tend gardens, take care of livestock, and learn to be more useful."
- AGREE with "The city should actually time stoplights correctly during rush hour to prevent complete gridlock"
- AGREE with "A person should not miss rent (say due to a car breakdown) and face eviction in less than 2 weeks (before next payday). Make it 30 days."
- DISAGREE with "Funding and support should be given to the existing BG buses, to expand their service area and improve accessibility."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should spend less time redoing the same sidewalks over and over again and focus on the areas that actually need improvement."
- AGREE with "Pass a no animals in a hot car ordinance."
- AGREE with "BG police should improve officer training and should be held accountable for abuse of power."
- DISAGREE with "There need to be harsher punishments for WKU campus rapes/sexual assaults."
- DISAGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- DISAGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
- DISAGREE with "If the state cannot provide good retirement benefits to KRS employees, the county/city should supplement the retirement with a 401k."
- AGREE with "Higher minimum wage"
- AGREE with "People should not be allowed to bring their pets every place or store they go to."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green is an excellent place to raise a family, shop, worship, get an education, and recreate. I feel safe in most places here in BG."
- DISAGREE with "A kayak trail from Lampkin Park to Barren River. Improved River access."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work
(2) City needs to mandate temp services furnish details of how much they are selling employee labor for, to the employee.
(3) Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Legalized Marijuana will not only assist Bowling Green in earning Tax revenue but will decrease the strain on our prison system. Win-Win.

- AGREE with "WKU and local community colleges should continue to offer courses that interest those seeking an education, whether or not the courses aid in job placement."
- DISAGREE with "The bypass area must be developed and utilized for new businesses and attractive structures. It is a neglected area that is losing business."

- DISAGREE with "Go to underground utilities. Scottsville rd and the by-pass look awful."

- DISAGREE with "Local food and small farms are one of BG best attractions."
- AGREE with "Why isn't Nashville Rd between the roundabout and Campbell Ln wider? Getting stuck there at 5 o'clock is a plague."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should have more healthy/clean eating options for those who have limited diets."
- AGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- DISAGREE with "KASPER is an invasion of privacy that contradicts what HIPAA regulations try to protect."
- DISAGREE with "Indoor swimming pools for public use and therapy year around without time restrictions due to special swim leagues. Encourage healthier life"
- AGREE with "University management bears more responsibility than federal and state education funding cuts for tuition rising so much over the years."
- AGREE with "Minimum wage required for businesses to receive tax credits should be raised to a living wage"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work

- DISAGREE with "Local food and small farms are one of BG best attractions."

- AGREE with "Bowling Green should have more healthy/clean eating options for those who have limited diets."
- AGREE with "No business should get tax credit without paying  workers at least $10 per hour plus benefits that would increase that to minimum of $15."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- DISAGREE with "KASPER is an invasion of privacy that contradicts what HIPAA regulations try to protect."

Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work
(2) Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security
(3) Temp svc need to furnish the equivalent of FMLA, despite not having 50 people at one single site.
".Would the person agree with this: "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
test_comment: We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Medical marijuana should be legal."

comment: City residents do not receive adequate return on County Taxes paid.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:

- AGREE with "Too many trees have been torn down to make way for new developments. We should re-plant more trees around Bowling Green."

- DISAGREE with "Recycling services need to be improved and modernized. Current contractor uses outdated equipment, services are messy, company unresponsive."

- AGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- AGREE with "District judges are biased towards large local companies to the detriment of individuals."
- AGREE with "Local companies that can't fill job openings should recruit from parts of KY w/ high unemployment & pay relocation expenses."
- DISAGREE with "We need more activities for families, such as a large-scale all-in-one kids play arena like All About Kids."
- DISAGREE with "When you prioritize the safety of people over automobile speed, all kinds of positive things happen. #slowthecars"
- DISAGREE with "Provide a food assistance program for college students as students lots of times do not qualify for food stamps due to living on campus"
- DISAGREE with "City/county parks should be focused on creating and maintain green places for residents to join.Avoid cement parking and adding buildings"
- AGREE with "We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more aid for the homeless whether: tiny house park, health clinic, rehabilitation, job readiness sources."
- AGREE with "The WKU Nursing Program should be expanded so we have more nurses"
- DISAGREE with "Too many apartments in Plano. Nice little country setting I bought my home in forever ruined!"
- DISAGREE with "Apartments for 55 and older that are upscale and lovely."
- AGREE with "If strict dress codes are required, uniforms should be provided by the school system, not eat into the  parents possibly small budget."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) City should pay 1.2-1.5m per annum for all homeless k-12 student/families a studio apartment at $500 or less. fund by occ tax move to 1.91%
(2) Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security
(3) The city and county work together to keep the low socieconomic status children out of certain schools. This reduces learning opportunities.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Traffic flow needs to be improved throughout Bowling Green, especially on Scottsville Road.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "The WKU Nursing Program should be expanded so we have more nurses"
- DISAGREE with "Connect business parking lots to reduce unnecessary traffic on main roadways"
- AGREE with "Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty"
- AGREE with "The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work"
- DISAGREE with "Footbridge from airport to across the street. Pilots running across the road."
- AGREE with "Downtown redevelopment should retain accessible parking for existing businesses."
- DISAGREE with "We need mixed-use development in the most disadvantaged areas of BG."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling green needs to work in beautifying the city . More Boulvard like roads with planted flowers and reducing overhead utility clusters."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- AGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- AGREE with "Legalizing marijuana at the state level could produce substantial tax revenue, but if only BG did, it would cause problems."
- DISAGREE with "Casinos. Bring them here."
- DISAGREE with "Shopping should be spread across all four corners of the county, so the traffic on Scottsville rd and Campbell lane will be improved."
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- AGREE with "We need jobs to attract our own college educated students so they don’t leave to get better paying jobs"
- DISAGREE with "There should be a push to improve mental health awareness and availability in Bowling Green."
- AGREE with "City needs to mandate temp services furnish details of how much they are selling employee labor for, to the employee."
- AGREE with "Beautification projects and other quality-of-life enhancements like parks and libraries help attract new residents and industries to our city/county."
- DISAGREE with "More advertising should be done along I-65 to promote tourism into Bowling Green."
- AGREE with "The Bowling Green Daily News is too politically slanted."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) City should pay 1.2-1.5m per annum for all homeless k-12 student/families a studio apartment at $500 or less. fund by occ tax move to 1.91%
(2) A person should not miss rent (say due to a car breakdown) and face eviction in less than 2 weeks (before next payday). Make it 30 days.
(3) Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Local fuel prices need to investigated."
- DISAGREE with "We need to carefully preserve agricultural land"
- DISAGREE with "Historic preservation of homes and buildings needs countywide attention to maintain our unique architectural heritage."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should consider a program, like Ft Worth Texas's Clean Slate, in which the homeless can earn money by cleaning up the city."
- DISAGREE with "There is not enough done for tourism in Warren Co. We offer much more than Corvettes and we should be promoting other activities."
- AGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- AGREE with "More citizens need to be involved in the future development of BG. Too many developers who benefit financially are calling the shots."
- DISAGREE with "I wish we had train service to Nashville"
- AGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- DISAGREE with "Require 4 yr HS lifeskills class, how to: family finance, file tax, repair/maintain car, repair/maintain home, cook/sew, apply/interview job"
- AGREE with "The city of Bowling Green should enforce their existing noise ordinance."
- AGREE with "People should not be allowed to bring their pets every place or store they go to."
- AGREE with "City and county parks departments should provide more programming for adults and seniors."
- DISAGREE with "Smallhouse Rd (at Campbell Ln) heading into town needs to be widened to have room for three lanes (left turn, straight, right turn)."
- DISAGREE with "Enact rent control laws to stabilize the constant increase in rates."
- AGREE with "The homeless population is getting out of hand. We need to find better methods for curtailing and rehabing and keeping them off the streets."
- DISAGREE with "More green spaces. All of our parks have just become sports complexes!"
- AGREE with "Drivers tests in BG should test over the rules of a turnabout."
- DISAGREE with "The Bowling Green/Warren County Airport needs to be relocated outside of the city limits."
- DISAGREE with "Driving in this town very dangerous, Drivers Education classes should be required for all new drivers!!!"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty
(2) Temp svc need to furnish the equivalent of FMLA, despite not having 50 people at one single site.
(3) Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: If city eliminates homelessness via occupational taxes, employers of homeless people need to reimburse city via special occ. tax penalty

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Drivers tests in BG should test over the rules of a turnabout."
- DISAGREE with "Install new sidewalks along major roads, like Three Springs, and city-wide bike routes, to decrease likelihood of accidents"
- AGREE with "One should not be able to literally "buy" their way into ability to vote in an election in a locality they do not live in.  $ don't buy vote"
- DISAGREE with "A fairness ordinance in Bowling Green would attract new businesses. No one wants to set up show in a town ethically stuck in the 1800s."
- AGREE with "We need to grow the internet infrastructure particularly in growing areas of the county like Alvaton."
- DISAGREE with "Allow residence of an area to vote on new developments that might have impact on them opposed to commissioners/magistrates getting kickbacks"
- AGREE with "There should be more healthy food options near/on campus of WKU."
- AGREE with "More concerts should be held in Bowling Green"
- DISAGREE with "Drug information classes should be given to incoming freshmen of WKU to educate them about the risks and health hazards."
- DISAGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
- DISAGREE with "There should be something a work farm for local prisoners to learn to tend gardens, take care of livestock, and learn to be more useful."
- DISAGREE with "There is too much continuous road work going on downtown. They need to get it together."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow"
- DISAGREE with "Animated digital business signs are a road hazard. They distract drivers."
- AGREE with "Parking lots should be monitored to prevent illegal parking in handicap spaces."
- AGREE with "Minimum wage required for businesses to receive tax credits should be raised to a living wage"
- AGREE with "If city eliminates homelessness via occupational taxes, employers of homeless people need to reimburse city via special occ. tax penalty"
- DISAGREE with "Better incorporation of university resources in community, including Kentucky Museum."
- DISAGREE with "City School taxes are too high , they need to budget more"
- AGREE with "The arts enrich our city."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) City had 109 homeless students in 2017, County Had 112.  Housing those families temporarily is worth raising tax rate from 1.85% to 1.91%.
(2) Temp svc need to furnish the equivalent of FMLA, despite not having 50 people at one single site.
(3) Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Traffic congestion on Fairview Ave and Cemetery Rd needs to be improved during evening rush hours."
- DISAGREE with "Provide a food assistance program for college students as students lots of times do not qualify for food stamps due to living on campus"
- AGREE with "7% of Paker-Bennett &  3.7% of Bristow homeless. I will pay 6 cents per $100 income to end homelessness for school-age families via Apt. $"
- DISAGREE with "The airport should be moved to the transpark."
- AGREE with "We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow"
- AGREE with "The area of downtown and the riverfront should continue to be developed for entertainment and recreation for both day and night activities."
- DISAGREE with "Promote access to mental health treatment, rather than treating addicts as criminals."
- AGREE with "Relax restrictions on fencing in Home Owners Associations to promote people keeping animals on leashes or in fenced yards."
- AGREE with "More concerts should be held in Bowling Green"
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more competitive internet rates."
- DISAGREE with "Warren County residents should not be charged the WASTE WATER SERVICE FEE on their water bills."
- AGREE with "City should bar non-competes, similar to North Dakota/California, as driving destitution in non-tenure work force. Be heroic destination."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs stricter code enforcement on property use and condition in some neighborhoods."
- DISAGREE with "Schools should offer more comprehensive sexual education to help lower STD and teen pregnancy rates."
- AGREE with "Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty"
- AGREE with "The arts enrich our city."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green should try to emulate Owensboro's Friday night programs downtown."
- DISAGREE with "apartment complexes should be required to participate in recycling program"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security
(2) The city and county work together to keep the low socieconomic status children out of certain schools. This reduces learning opportunities.
(3) Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- DISAGREE with "Drug information classes should be given to incoming freshmen of WKU to educate them about the risks and health hazards."
- DISAGREE with "Crime is worse in Bowling Green / Warren County than it was a decade ago."
- DISAGREE with "Lease laws should be enacted and enforced in the county as they are in the city."
- AGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs more cultural and educational establishments, like sciemce, history and art museums."
- AGREE with "Local fuel prices need to investigated."
- DISAGREE with "Wal-Mart and Kroger grocery pick-up should have to accept EBT for the elderly and disabled"
- DISAGREE with "More gender-neutral bathrooms need to be seen across BG on WKU's campus, in local businesses, etc."
- AGREE with "I should be allowed to plant flowers in my own yard where ever i want them."
- DISAGREE with "Older neighborhoods change from owner occupied to rental.  Deterioration occurs.  Stronger landlord/tenant laws needed!"
- AGREE with "Smoking should not be allowed in public parks."
- DISAGREE with "I wish we had train service to Nashville"
- DISAGREE with "We know fentanyl is coming through our post office. Law enforcement should have dogs finding it before it kills the next youth."
- DISAGREE with "If we cut a major program, WKU would lose in the revenue the program brings in, ultimately costing more money."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- AGREE with "Why has the Police stop enforcing parking regulations? Park any way any direction. Is it time for a separate Traffic Enforcement Division?"
- AGREE with "Locally owned, small businesses should get incentives and assistance -- not chains and outside investors."
- AGREE with "Recycling centers should be moved out of town."
- AGREE with "Minimum wage required for businesses to receive tax credits should be raised to a living wage"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work
(2) The city and county work together to keep the low socieconomic status children out of certain schools. This reduces learning opportunities.
(3) Temp svc need to furnish the equivalent of FMLA, despite not having 50 people at one single site.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Don't waste $800,000 of tax dollars for a fountain in Lamkin park. Residents would be better served with educational programs for the youth!"
- AGREE with "BG police should improve officer training and should be held accountable for abuse of power."
- DISAGREE with "Recreational marijuana should be legal."
- DISAGREE with "We know fentanyl is coming through our post office. Law enforcement should have dogs finding it before it kills the next youth."
- DISAGREE with "More walking/nature trails in our sports-centric parks. Have certain hours where walkers can enjoy the beauty of Paul Walker Golf Course."
- AGREE with "Oversight committees for projects such as TIF. Elected officials should not be able to sit on unelected boards."
- AGREE with "Fireworks use in residential areas is out of control with no police presence to enforce the already in place restrictions."
- DISAGREE with "Crime is worse in Bowling Green / Warren County than it was a decade ago."
- DISAGREE with "We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new."
- AGREE with "Reducing poverty will enhance the quality of life for everyone in our community regardless of status."
- DISAGREE with "BG has a bad problem with littering.  My husband and I fill up to 5 recycle bins every week between downtown and campus, cleaning it all up."
- DISAGREE with "BG needs more Summer weekend festivals/activities"
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done to improve traffic flow"
- AGREE with "The arts enrich our city."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more opportunities for the arts and sciences in the Housing Authority so the students there can rise above!"
- DISAGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
- AGREE with "City and county parks departments should provide more programming for adults and seniors."
- AGREE with "The downtown parking garage has been an eyesore for years. It's embarrassing, so fix it!"
- AGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work
(2) The city and county work together to keep the low socieconomic status children out of certain schools. This reduces learning opportunities.
(3) Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "New home zoning should be for single family dwellings rather than multi-family units (apartments)."
- DISAGREE with "Cable companies need competition and not be allowed to raise rates of  customers. Once you sign on, that is your rate unless you upgrade."
- DISAGREE with "Recruit and retain the best k-13 teachers graduating from WKU"
- AGREE with "We need to commit more resources to the North-Northeast ends of town. Blue collar people who help make Bowling Green what is. Too neglected."
- AGREE with "Temporary housing for the homeless in the community."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs to annex a solid geographic area & thereby eliminating those areas within our city that are not receiving city services."
- DISAGREE with "WKU should consider building a parking structure at the Chestnut St lot."
- AGREE with "Why has the Police stop enforcing parking regulations? Park any way any direction. Is it time for a separate Traffic Enforcement Division?"
- AGREE with "Arts education should be available in every school in Warren County and other surrounding areas."
- DISAGREE with "Many drivers fail to stop as traffic lights turn red.  As many as 3 cars will travel through an intersection after light has changed to red."
- AGREE with "LGBTQ fairness is far-left political idiocy."
- DISAGREE with "We already have a lot of parks. And the libraries have become a hangout for the homeless.  Do something about that problem first"
- DISAGREE with "Encourage connection between the wealthy and the poor"
- AGREE with "Institute a business development grant that encourages WKU grads to stay in Bowling Green by starting local businesses."
- AGREE with "BGDN should publish each month the number of job positions filled / people employed through the Workforce Development Board’s efforts."
- DISAGREE with "I still have to drive out of town to eat Golden Corral."
- DISAGREE with "Term limits should be initiated on county executives."
- DISAGREE with "some children with cultural differences or dietary needs cannot eat a typical lunch at school please provide special diet options."
- AGREE with "Too much money is spent on making sure we cut our grass and don't park in the yard."
- AGREE with "Drivers tests in BG should test over the rules of a turnabout."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) A person should not miss rent (say due to a car breakdown) and face eviction in less than 2 weeks (before next payday). Make it 30 days.
(2) Temp svc need to furnish the equivalent of FMLA, despite not having 50 people at one single site.
(3) Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Higher minimum wage

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "BGDN should publish each month the number of job positions filled / people employed through the Workforce Development Board’s efforts."
- AGREE with "The rental market prices are well beyond an affordable housing level and needs to be addressed given the number of renters in BG."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs to attract business like Costco and Trader Joe's to keep residents from driving to Nashville on weekends"
- DISAGREE with "Schools should provide an opportunity for nonswimming parent/guardians to have water safety and swimming lessons in private setting."
- AGREE with "Stronger tenant and renters rights. Landlord accountability for keeping properties in good shape. So many overpriced dilapidated rentals."
- DISAGREE with "It should be mandatory for all homes/businesses to have visible marking on mailbox and building for their address."
- DISAGREE with "BG needs more Summer weekend festivals/activities"
- AGREE with "More roundabouts for intersections"
- AGREE with "Higher paying jobs- the ability to move up with reasonable raises."
- DISAGREE with "animal cruelty laws need to exist and be enforced"
- AGREE with "City needs to mandate temp services furnish details of how much they are selling employee labor for, to the employee."
- DISAGREE with "Fewer students per teacher should be a rule. No more than 20; ideal class size of 15. Plenty of teachers are looking for work."
- AGREE with "Louisville rd area needs more businesses and restaurants extending out towards the factories to also bring in revenue from Edmonson Co."
- DISAGREE with "The Old Morgantown Rd train crossing needs either an underpass or an overpass"
- DISAGREE with "Marijuana should not be legalized."
- AGREE with "Lower taxes by auditing every department for total accountability & make cuts where possible. Stop city government waste."
- AGREE with "Extra police, or parking enforcement unit should be on duty during events to maintain legal parking"
- DISAGREE with "The Bowling Green/Warren County Airport needs to be relocated outside of the city limits."
- DISAGREE with "we need transit buses for elderly and disabled in the county and they should be easy to enter and exit/wheelchair accessible"
- AGREE with "When the city tears up lawns with projects they should be required to do what it takes so that lawns are same quality they were before."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work
(2) Temp service need to pay higher hourly rate to temp than hiring firm pays their FTE to account for reduced economic security
(3) Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: You shouldn't be required to pay County taxes if you live in the City (but not the other way around). It makes no sense.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "Shopping should be spread across all four corners of the county, so the traffic on Scottsville rd and Campbell lane will be improved."
- AGREE with "We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green should have more healthy/clean eating options for those who have limited diets."
- AGREE with "Actually teach HS students useful things."
- AGREE with "Recreational Cannabis in KY offers tourism, increased revenue, job opportunities, and shows massive leadership in the southern region."
- AGREE with "Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park."
- DISAGREE with "We need well planned service roads, instead of so many driveways directly on streets like Campbell Lane and the By pass."
- DISAGREE with "Refugees and immigrants are welcome next door."
- AGREE with "Encourage local business development with grants, etc. For a city this size, it is ridiculous that we have basically one local coffee shop!"
- DISAGREE with "city needs to work on water run off when we have a lot of rain.. to many places flood on roadways makes driving very dangerous.."
- AGREE with "Bike lanes that are wide enough to safely ride on without fear of being hit by passing cars."
- DISAGREE with "Footbridge from airport to across the street. Pilots running across the road."
- DISAGREE with "City residents do not receive adequate return on County Taxes paid."
- DISAGREE with "Lease laws should be enacted and enforced in the county as they are in the city."
- AGREE with "High sugar items like pop tarts and chocolate muffins should not be a part of the public school breakfast menu"
- AGREE with "We need more activities/places to go for teenagers; basically all there is are places to eat, the mall, and the bowling alley"
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs a fairness ordinance to protect the rights of its citizens."
- AGREE with "Unelected school board officials should not have the power to create, add, or increase "school taxes"."
- DISAGREE with "The Fairness Ordinance, as currently proposed, poses insufficient protection for religious conscience and should be revised accordingly."
- DISAGREE with "Better enforcement of traffic violations. Too many running red lights, parking in fire lanes, cell phone usage while driving"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) City should bar garbage token health plans designed to prevent temp services paying $166/month Obamacare emp. fee. Let ppl get subsidy.
(2) City needs to bar big COs employing from half a dozen temp services to keep 100s ineligble for FMLA due to less than 50 ppl/per 'employer'
(3) City needs to mandate temp services furnish details of how much they are selling employee labor for, to the employee.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: Educate high schoolers on their options after they graduate

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "Higher education is intended to help young people develop into informed, well-rounded citizens who contribute positively to society."
- DISAGREE with "Develop the Greenway so that the paved trail is continuous and reaches major parts of the city including the square, WKU, GM, and others."
- DISAGREE with "Rental property taxes should be reduced for private landlords to encourage them to develop more, as opposed to large ones like Chandler."
- DISAGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- DISAGREE with "Provide a food assistance program for college students as students lots of times do not qualify for food stamps due to living on campus"
- AGREE with "BGDN should publish each month the number of job positions filled / people employed through the Workforce Development Board’s efforts."
- DISAGREE with "BGMU needs to be held accountable for their rates and "averages.""
- AGREE with "BG police should improve officer training and should be held accountable for abuse of power."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see part of the downtown area converted to an "art district". Something similar to the Wynnwood Walls in Miami, FL."
- AGREE with "Too much money is spent on making sure we cut our grass and don't park in the yard."
- AGREE with "When the city tears up lawns with projects they should be required to do what it takes so that lawns are same quality they were before."
- DISAGREE with "There should be more cooperation between WKU and Bowling Green, especially for things like internships and community involvement."
- AGREE with "We need to promote competition in town for Charter. AT&T isn't much better and doesn't serve everywhere. Need more fiber to the homes."
- AGREE with "Lower taxes by auditing every department for total accountability & make cuts where possible. Stop city government waste."
- AGREE with "More citizens need to be involved in the future development of BG. Too many developers who benefit financially are calling the shots."
- DISAGREE with "Internet services should be a public municipality."
- DISAGREE with "I should be able to vote in city elections if I pay city taxes, even though I may live in the county."
- AGREE with "Junking up highways/roadways with signs should not be the primary way tourism is promoted."
- AGREE with "11,000 Total American deaths from cocaine is not equal to 45,000 deaths from opoids, therefore false race-baiting news is a problem."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green needs an indoor / outdoor sports event complex/"
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) The city should craft a very simple fairness ordinance, saying no discrimination acquiring housing, but not giving LGBTQ EEOC Bypass @work
(2) City should bar non-competes, similar to North Dakota/California, as driving destitution in non-tenure work force. Be heroic destination.
(3) Homeless people deserve full size places like studio apartments.  Not tiny homes like a smurf would desire in a tiny house park.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: We need more things to do for ages 1-6. A children’s museum or a small science museum would be wonderful.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- AGREE with "The intersection at Taco Bell and KFC is a nightmare"
- AGREE with "There are not enough family-centered activities to do down town."
- DISAGREE with "I would like to see a revitalization of older parts of Bowling Green, by giving home improvement grants to home owners. Approval process req"
- DISAGREE with "The Smokey Bones entrance off of Scottsville Road is extremely dangerous and needs a traffic light."
- DISAGREE with "we need transit buses for elderly and disabled in the county and they should be easy to enter and exit/wheelchair accessible"
- AGREE with "Louisville rd area needs more businesses and restaurants extending out towards the factories to also bring in revenue from Edmonson Co."
- AGREE with "Actually teach HS students useful things."
- DISAGREE with "More choices when it comes to internet.  BGMU has been offering service to businesses for a while, they should expand to offer to residents."
- AGREE with "Do SOMETHING about completing the "wrap" downtown, or at least enhance (and that includes restaurant service) what is currently there."
- DISAGREE with "Connect business parking lots to reduce unnecessary traffic on main roadways"
- AGREE with "Refugees should be required to learn and speak english."
- AGREE with "Relax restrictions on fencing in Home Owners Associations to promote people keeping animals on leashes or in fenced yards."
- DISAGREE with "Most drugs except meth should be free & government controlled. See Belgium."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green is an excellent place to raise a family, shop, worship, get an education, and recreate. I feel safe in most places here in BG."
- DISAGREE with "We need a fiber option for internet."
- DISAGREE with "A senior living community, designed for 50+ residents rather than 75+ & in failing health residents, is needed — and apparently ignored."
- DISAGREE with "We need to block left turns on the busy parts of the by-pass so people don't block everyone else trying to turn."
- DISAGREE with "Law enforcement should send drug possession arrestees for rehabilitation services rather than imprisonment."
- AGREE with "Water safety and swim lessons to all k-12 students."
- AGREE with "We should be incentivizing higher paying jobs coming to BG. Cost of living is outrunning wages and it's starting to be a problem."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) City should bar non-competes, similar to North Dakota/California, as driving destitution in non-tenure work force. Be heroic destination.
(2) Temp svc need to furnish the equivalent of FMLA, despite not having 50 people at one single site.
(3) Every school has 1-9% homeless people. This is for the government to deal with via economic policy.  Not sending to a NGO or giving a shanty
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: A clean, efficient public transportation system would be a huge help to those with limited ability or desire to drive.

subject: agree_disagree_best_guess_less_agree
prompt template:
Suppose a person has the following opinions on the following assertions:
- DISAGREE with "There are too many apartments being built. Our economy can't continue to support it. There will be a bust & it might be sooner than later."
- AGREE with "We need to replace "Room at the Inn" services with temporary decent housing connected to aid agencies for the homeless"
- AGREE with "Require businesses to pick up litter they and their customers generate."
- DISAGREE with "Like Steamers but hate they ruined that historic building"
- DISAGREE with "NO to the "Fairness" Ordinance. Current law is sufficient.  ZERO reported instances where LGBTQ people have been discriminated against in BG"
- AGREE with "The bypass area must be developed and utilized for new businesses and attractive structures. It is a neglected area that is losing business."
- DISAGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"
- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- DISAGREE with "Graves Gilbert has created a healthcare monopoly within Bowling Green and the surrounding areas."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green has many excellent non-public schools; more should be done to make these options available to diverse and low-income families."
- DISAGREE with "BG can link/support hotel/food, recreational/cultural venues in a Tourism Passport, giving discounts when at least 3 are purchased together."
- AGREE with "Bowling Green needs more pet-friendly housing options for renters."
- DISAGREE with "If private schools were to get a share of Federal or State education dollars, it would hurt public schools."
- AGREE with "Something needs to be done with the river area- river walk, park, restaurants, summer events- to give the communities ways to get together."
- AGREE with "More bike trails and walking trails would be a great addition."
- AGREE with "Harsher sentences for drug users would help combat the opioid epidemic."
- DISAGREE with "Bowling Green  has been monopolized by Houchens.  Limit their growth they own too much of the city for it to be fair to other businesses"
- DISAGREE with "Legalizing marijuana at the state level could produce substantial tax revenue, but if only BG did, it would cause problems."
- DISAGREE with "You can't get a job in this county at a large place of employment if you have OLD DUI's on your record. This is an un-needed punishment!"
- AGREE with "I would like to see more community art and music programs. For instance, I would love to sign up for a community choir."
Additionally, the person has written the following on this topic: "(1) Pass an ordinance that requires pet owners to pay a fee if their pets are not fixed.
(2) Allow parents that take their kids out of public schools to use that money in a private school.
(3) A fine if your cat or dog is picked up as a stray and is not spayed or neutered in the county.
".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
comment: We should focus downtown development dollars on rehabilitation and reuse of buildings that can be done so, rather than building new.

- AGREE with "Educate high schoolers on their options after they graduate"

- DISAGREE with "City needs to mandate temp services furnish details of how much they are selling employee labor for, to the employee."

".Would the person agree with this: "{comment}"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.

- AGREE with "Invest in the youth."
- AGREE with "Smoking should not be allowed within 25 feet of a business."
- DISAGREE with "Historic preservation of homes and buildings needs countywide attention to maintain our unique architectural heritage."

- DISAGREE with "If private schools were to get a share of Federal or State education dollars, it would hurt public schools."

- DISAGREE with "Leash laws should be more strictly enforced in both the city and county"

- DISAGREE with "Like Steamers but hate they ruined that historic building"
- AGREE with "animal cruelty laws need to exist and be enforced"
- DISAGREE with "BGDN should publish these BGPD stats weekly – 1) traffic citations 2) vehicle accidents reported; 3) traffic accidents resulting in injury."
- AGREE with "Farmers shouldn’t need a permit to build a fence."
- AGREE with "Pass an ordinance that requires pet owners to pay a fee if their pets are not fixed."

(2) Pass a no animals in a hot car ordinance.

".Would the person agree with this: "Recycling services need to be expanded & improved. With growing population, think of how much land will become dump sites...Ridiculous!"? Answer AGREE if they would agree and DISAGREE if they would disagree. Only put AGREE if you are reasonably confident that they would agree, as a safe default you should put DISAGREE. Your output should always be AGREE or DISAGREE and nothing else.
